author: {'steamid': '76561198281011790', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1609860863}
review:
除非你有朋友，不然線上連線超級困難。即使連線成功，除非你本身就是超級玩家等級，不然常常立馬被對手Ko，玩也無法體驗連線的廝殺樂趣。
遊戲比較適合單機版連線，和朋友家人同樂，操作簡單且易上手。
如果是要買來自己，除非你有愛，不然手機app有更多同款且免費的遊戲可以選擇。

我遊戲目的是連線對打，隨有俄羅斯或魔法泡泡的底子。但好不容易連線到，卻遇到都是骨灰級的高手，無法體驗連線廝殺快感，所以我退款了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198928561910', 'num_games_owned': 131, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 418, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 370, 'last_played': 1625442902}
review: It's good but the only problem i have with this game is that it has a yellow background so I always think of persona 4 golden my favorite game of all time and honestly... this can't compare.

author: {'steamid': '76561198122394129', 'num_games_owned': 148, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 6284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5006, 'last_played': 1695453714}
review:
It's Tetris. It's colorful. I have no complaints.


The AI is challenging and will help with making you an above average player if you put in the time.

This game is worth it, in my opinion.

author: {'steamid': '76561198170175641', 'num_games_owned': 716, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 9192, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7008, 'last_played': 1627256176}
review:
Came into this with absolutely no knowledge of the Puyo series, came out of this loving it and wishing for more to be localized. Puyo Puyo is addicting and really fun!

The game itself is wonderful, the story mode is a great entry point for either series to help you learn, or to just have fun with the charming characters.

It's basically dead online wise, the only people you'll run into are way too good at the game, so that's really the only thing I wouldn't recommend, but if you have any friends to have a private lobby with, this is TONS of fun. 

With the sequel releasing soon on PC, I would recommend it more - simply because it's basically the same game but the sequel has more content and quality of life changes. The only downside is that the characters no longer call out Sega when you launch the game :(

TLDR; would definitely recommend this game for some fun lighthearted puzzle content.

review:
Well done.  Clean, snappy interface, pretty much what you'd expect from a tetris / puyo puyo mix, with many options and variations.  The character personalities have just a few phrases they keep repeating, and that's really the only part that gets annoying about the game.

On linux, I also found if I leave it unattended long enough that my screensaver would kick in, they didn't work well together and the game hangs.  Fortunately that's pretty rare.

author: {'steamid': '76561198799026609', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 25978, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 598, 'last_played': 1704916501}
review:
Uno de los mejores juegos de verdad jugadlo por favor. Muchas modalidades e increíbles formas de juego. Merecen probarlas todas, todas acaban gustando, tanto, que es que ni yo sé cuál es mi favorita.
Es verdad que competir contra otros jugadores puede también tener desventajas, pero, a la vez, te enseña a progresar mucho en estos juegos. Jugar a este juego me ayuda a mejorar en él, a relajarme de vez en cuando, y a reflexionar. Bueno, pienso que no merece menos de 9/10, pero tampoco es perfecto. Ojalá le metan personajes de antes a esta versión, por ejemplo, Yu & Rei, Donguri Gaeru, o esos otros personajes del 2014 del Puyo Puyo 20th Anniversary, esos estaban guays. Por favor metedlos T_T. Bueno, un 9,75 de 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198128765929', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 6650, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4646, 'last_played': 1682416304}
review:
내가 낼 수 있는 가장 빠른 속도로 블럭을 쌓는데 고인물들한테 전부 상쇄당하고 쳐맞기만 하는게 일상임. 해볼만 하다 싶으면 기다렸다는 듯이 쥐어패는데 순식간에 쌓여가는 블럭을 보고 뇌정지밖에 안옴
 고인물친구는 잘한다 잘한다 하면서 2라운드 주고 기분 좋아질때즈음 나에게 빅엿을 선사해주는데 맞을때마다 화낼데도 없고 학창시절 옆자리에서 지건날리던 짝궁 생각나서 개빡침. 분명 남이 할 때는 여유롭게 하나하나 막으면서 공격도 겸하던데 내가하면 테트던 T스핀이던 하나씩 만들어낼때 저쪽은 이미 저끝까지 쌓여서 내 새끼 뭐하고있나 구경하는 부모처럼 관전하고 있다가 준비됐어? 준비됐지? 하고 하나씩 쳐박는데 뉴비입장에서는 막아낼 재량도 없고 한번 막아내더라도 다음에 그다음까지 막을거 생각하면 답도없음. 이 ㅈ망겜이 뭐라고 70시간 씩이나 허비했는지 모르겠지만 자신이 쳐맞는걸 좋아하는 성격이거나 나 정도 피지컬이면 할만한데? 라고 생각하는 사람들은 찍먹해보는 것도 나쁘진 않은것같음.

author: {'steamid': '76561198804016984', 'num_games_owned': 106, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 71780, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71752, 'last_played': 1703367539}
review:
Will give this a like purely because of how much I enjoyed it. worth it for the league content. while it might not offer the most fluid or extensive tetris or puyo engine, DAS was slow for my taste and line breaks lowers skill ceiling a bit (tetris main), but overall it was a fun experience. 

Don't recommend buying it NOW though, sequel is coming out in spring.

author: {'steamid': '76561198253298731', 'num_games_owned': 276, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 14412, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10992, 'last_played': 1706662759}
review:
[h1] A Brief Summary [/h1]

Overall, this is an amazing puzzle fighter, with a good amount of content to keep you coming back.

[h1] The Casual Experience (Singleplayer) [/h1]

As a puzzle game crossover it does its job. The Tetris and Puyo mechanics are solid. It has everything you'd expect in a Tetris game like score, time attack and endless modes, plus a few other competitive modes (my favorite of which being Swap). The game even has a charming little adventure mode that's actually a pretty good introduction to all the various modes in the game, and as a new player the adventure mode was actually relatively challenging.

That being said as a Puyo game it is honestly a bit bare bones on modes. Previous Puyo games had a plethora of casual and fun modes, something Puyo Puyo Tetris unfortunately lacks, which is a shame because I feel this game has a lot of potential for unique modes.

Nevertheless the game still has a good amount of content and features.

[h1] The Competitive Experience (Multiplayer) [/h1]

Competitively, this is one of the most fun games I've ever played. This game has an extremely high skill ceiling and you'll keep improving even after spending thousands of hours into this game.

That being said it isn't perfect.

Getting into both of these games competitively as the tutorials only teach you the basic mechanics of each game, and you'd have to rely on external sources to better learn key concepts such as Tetris openers, or Puyo chaining forms which are key to playing the game.

If you're playing Tetris vs Tetris its a speedy/aggressive endurance match. Puyo vs Puyo is slower paced where almost every piece dropped is critical to overwhelm your opponent. Both fun in their own right. Puyo vs Tetris on the other hand is a bit of a mess:

From a Tetris player's perspective: 
A Puyo player can be so annoyingly defensive, seemingly taking an endless amount damage and still surviving, and when they attack they do an unreasonable amount of damage. Either the match ends too quickly and not much of a fight is made, or the match drags on for far too long until you make a single mistake which will lead to your demise.

For a Puyo player's perspective:
As a Puyo player you are conditioned to build large chains, but when faced with a fast Tetris player that doesn't become an option as you are forced to deal with an endless amount of garbage, blocking your chains off and have to pray that the game's RNG is kind enough to let you survive. It can be an endurance match that can feel unwinnable sometimes.

There is also one over-centralising mechanic in Tetris called the 4-wide. I won't get into too much detail,  but it is an extremely annoying strategy to deal with, regardless of the mode.

The game's online is decent enough. Most matches I've played are very fluent, with lag usually not being a factor, though I had a few times, when the game would disconnect a match for seemingly no reason.

Be wary though that the Random Matchmaking (aka Puzzle League), at least in this version of the game, matches you up with literally anyone, and I would recommend the console versions instead if you were interested in playing online with random people as those games attempt to match you with someone around your rating (though it may not help that the sequel is out a lot of the player-base migrated to that game)

[h1] Concluding thoughts [/h1]

Throughout the course of this review I've been VERY critical of this game, however overall I love this game. Its the game that introduced me to competitive Puyo and Tetris both games that I have an extreme amount of fun with today, and still keep coming back to. Its a good game casually, and is one of the best competitive Tetris games out there (and THE BEST official Tetris game yet.

[i] *As for competitive Puyo, Puyo Puyo Champions is a slightly better competitive experience, but the Puyo is still great in this game. [i]

review:
[h1][b][u]OVERALL[/u]: 8/10[/b][/h1]

Puyo Puyo and Tetris are both legendary games by now and mixing the two is nicely executed here. You get your classic Tetris and puyo puyo modes and a mix of the two on the same grid. It is quite a fair value on a sale. Be mindful that online play most likely is deader than dead by now.

Also could have done without this BS Kawai art style !!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198025084436', 'num_games_owned': 821, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 1469, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1405, 'last_played': 1616897434}
review:
"Puyos and Tetriminos Collide in a Frantic Four-Player Puzzle Mashup!"

°TL;DR°

Se você for competitivo em Tetris vale mais jogar em um tetr.io ou comprar Tetris Effect na EGS, enquanto try hards de Puyo é melhor jogar Champions, mesmo quem ainda quer tentar a população é morta e você apenas irá aproveitar se estiver com amigos que joguem ou num discord. Os compradores casuais irão ter um maior proveito rindo e jogando o modo Adventure, aproveitando os modos mais casuais e descontraidos assim como ficando satisfeito contra a cpu arrastando amigos para comprar o jogo ou jogando por remote play sendo uma boa compra para jogar Tetris descompromissado ou Puyo conhecendo raro fã.

°Introdução°

Tetris precisa de introdução? O jogo foi criado pelo russo Alexey Pajitnov em 1984 no computador Electronika 60, após turbulentas brigas judiciais com a Nintendo em 1996 foi fundado a Tetris Company com o criador e Henk Rogers. Tetris normalmente não foi pensado como um jogo "competitivo" até essa idéia se popularizar com a série "Tetris: The Grand Master" pela Arika em 1998. 

Puyo Puyo é um spin-off da série Madou Monogatari, uma série de dungeon crawlers feito pela Compile, trazendo grande sucesso para e empresa, complicações financeiras fez a empresa vender "temporariamente" para a SEGA tendo como Puyo Puyo BOX em 2000 sendo o ultimo lançamento feito pela empresa original, a nova dona começou então com Minna de Puyo Puyo no GBA (Puyo Pop no ocidente) em 2001.

As duas franquias seguiram seus rumos com a série TGM tendo seu ultimo jogo lançado em 2005 e Sega lançou o seu jogo de aniversário de 20 anos em 2011. 2014 então para a surpresa tanto dos fãs competitivos como casuais de puyo e tetris a sega lança para diversas plataformas um crossover curioso...apenas no japão. Isso teria sido apenas uma curiosidade se não fosse o canal da Giant Bomb no YouTube com sua série "Quick Look" popularizando ainda mais importação tanto fisica quanto digital.

A Sega vendo potêncial para uma segunda (ou terceira?) chance de localizar a série no ocidente lançando em 2017 uma localização para PS4 e Switch se valendo de uma brecha na questão de direitos de Tetris (que estavam por um tempo pela Ubisoft, criadora do terrível Tetris Ultimate).

Finalmente em 2018 a série chega na Steam depois de alguns teases nos forúns da plataforma de jogos anteriores da Sega.

°Gameplay°

Tetris usa o sistema SRS como mandado pela Tetris Guideline então é garantido Quality of Life como peças fantasmas, cores fixas, etc. O seu objetivo como desde 84 é completar "linhas" para ou subir a tela de outro jogador de Tetris ou lançar "puyos lixos" caso seja uma partida mista, como também fazer "spins" com peças em entradas especificas assim criando ataques mais poderosos para seu oponente.

Puyo são esferas gelatinosas que juntando quatro da mesma cor elas somem, assim seu objetivo é fazer "cadeias" de puyos que sumindo em sequências de tamanhos cadas vez maiores causam as mesmas adversidades citadas anteriormente em Tetris, a unica diferença que apesar dos "puyos lixos" dificultarem sua vida fazendo "combos" com eles ajudam um pouco no dano causado.

O controle para ambos são bem idênticos, você pode locomover as peças para os lados ou segurar para baixo como "soft drop", botões para girar no sentido horário ou anti-horário. Tetris contém duas features extras: um "hard drop" que permite num instante fazer cair a peça no lugar planejado e um botão para "segurar" uma peça para usar depois mas você não pode usar duas vezes seguidas.

Outros modos podem por exemplo permitir que quem jogue no modo Puyo também tenha essas features extra como em partidas Fusion.

°Personagens°

O número 24 foi algo sagrado para a Sega até este jogo, portanto alguns personagens de Fever como Accord, Lidelle, Yu & Rei, Ocean Prince, etc... tiveram que dar espaço para Tetris ter sua representatividade com novas personalidades, eles são:

Tee: Capitão da nave espacial Tetra, o atual "Rei do Tetris", ele encontra Ringo quando tetraminós caem do céu em Suzuran. Puyo dropset igual a Ringo.
O: Parceiro do capitão, oficial de comunicação e mascote, apenas se comunica por "pi" e "bi", basicamente Carbuncle de Tetris. Herda dropset de Onion Pixie.
Ess: Navegadora da tripulação. É fofa porém pirralha, rude e chorona, ama seu "Papa". Roubou lugar e dropset de Lidelle.
Ai: O antropomórfico chiuaua, chefe engenheiro da tripulação bem cavalheiro e inteligente, facilmente tiltado pelos gêmeos abaixo. Usa dropset de Donguri Gaeru.
Jay&Elle: A dupla inseparável e insuportável em suas travessuras, falam em sincronia. Não surpreendente reutilizam dropset dos fantasmas Yu&Rei
Zed: O aparente intimidador mas esforçado "dono de casa" da nave, "Pai" de Ess. Dropset de Ocean Prince.
??: Misterioso personagem que teve influência na mistura de mundos. Herdou o dropset puyo de Accord.

Os personagens Schezo, Feli, Draco, Sat-"Dark Prince", Witch, Ecolo, Lemres e ?? precisam ser habilitados jogando o modo Adventure. É também possível habilitar sets de voz alternativos, indo desde versões mais hilárias, curiosas ou sérias/assustadoras dos bonecos.

°Offline°

O jogo contém diversos modos, Adventure você acompanha o desenrolar da história de Ringo e seus amigos conhecendo a trupê da nave Tetra enquanto tentam desvender o mistério da junção tanto dos mundos de Puyo como Tetris mas claro sem perder o bom humor. Solo e Multiplayer Arcade são modos mais tradicionais, eles são:

Versus: Batalhe com um ou mais oponentes/amigos com livre escolha entre puyo e tetris. Jogando contra a CPU você pode decidir uma batalha personalizada ou o modo Endurance em que você enfrenta um infinito numero de oponentes até perder.
Fusion: Um dos piores modos do jogo, como a tradução em português diria é uma "fusão" entre tetris e puyo puyo, há uma colher de chá que você pode fazer "cadeias" em cima da hora assim como "linhas" de tetris.
Swap: Alterna entra um campo de Tetris e um de Puyo Puyo em tempos pré determinados, pode fazer cadeias ou linhas de ultima hora para atazanar seu oponente na transição.
Big Bang: Puyo aqui é bem parecido com o modo Fever em que você deve achar o "gatilho" de cadeias prontas enquanto tetris há entradas prontinhas para alocar peças precisando apenas velocidade ou cuidado caso apareça buracos que apenas possam ser usado com "spins".

Challenge contém modos apenas disponiveis para single player, descrevendo eles:

Endless Fever: Um "Big Bang" de puyo sozinho.
Endless Puyo: Você contra um tempo pré determinado faço o maior numero de cadeias ou ligações de puyo.
Tiny Puyo: Muito parecido com o anterior mas puyos menores permitem um campo e cadeias maiores.
Sprint: Complete 40 linhas de Tetris o mais rápido possível.
Marathon: Faça 150 linhas com a maior pontuação que conseguir.
Ultra: Em 3 minutos faça seu melhor lol.

°Online°

Há três modos relevantes:

Puzzle League: Um passável porém mal planejado modo online competitivo, você pode nas opções desligar os modos mais gimmicks mas ironicamente aqui mostra a fraqueza do crossover, não é equilibrado uma partida entre Tetris e Puyo, o que não seria um problema caso tivesse opção de enfrentar apenas um deles. Caso consiga tolerar ou não ver problema infelizmente você dificilmente irá achar contras, achando são monstros que irão atropelar você em 1 minuto...

Free Play: Caso tenha amigos com o jogo ou entre em um discord que jogue, você pode abrir salas com diversas opções, até algumas como liberar hard drop para Puyo e claro embates com até quatro jogadores.

Replays: Veja seus replays subido por outros jogadores, você pode mandar o seu também.

°Lições°

Uma parte que poderia ser ótimas para novos jogadores porém é muito curta e expressa, você aqui pode ter uma noção melhor tanto como se joga Puyo ou Tetris mas apenas assistindo e lendo conselhos e conceitos do que algo interativo, isso é corrigido em Puyo Champions e a continuação deste crossover.

Let the fact that I am wasting a review for a game I actually enjoy playing even with all the issues it has stand. If PPT2 ever comes out on Steam, expect a similar review, as well as some real backlash. You earned it, you richy f**gots.

review: 그 이 게임은 2000 래이팅이든 말든 고인물밖에 안남아서 적어도 20000은 만나는 대칭 씹망겜에 심지어 다른 나라와 할 때 핑차이가 많이 나면 튕기기도 하는 그냥 개쓰레기 게임이라고 생각합니다. 절대 사지 마시고 이 게임을 즐기고 싶으시다면 차라리 크롬에 가서 폴란드 테트리스를 깔아서 하시면 쾌적하고 고인물이 적은 매우 클린한 모습을 볼 수 있습니다. 지금 이 글을 읽은 당신 이 글을 부정한다면 당신은 혹시? 뿌슬람이 분명합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198442202891', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 17144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15729, 'last_played': 1703032300}
review: This game does a great job of taking two different puzzle games and pitting them together in a very fun way. The visuals are great, all the different game modes are addicting, and the story, while pretty simple and somewhat childish, has a certain charm to it that makes it fun to play through. Of course, there are a few issues, such as the online matchmaking and Tetris having the advantage over Puyo, but overall it is a great game that I would recommend to both Puyo and Tetris fans.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043526654', 'num_games_owned': 199, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 14421, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7693, 'last_played': 1705326689}
review:
예전에 뿌요뿌요2 고전게임을 되게 좋아했어서 친구 추천으로 할인할 때 샀는데 정말 재밌게 하고있습니다.
고인물 겜이란 인식이 많은데 생각보다 뉴비도 종종 보이고, 무시무시한 뿌요 유저보다 테트리스 유저가 많아서 너무 걱정 안하셔도 될 듯. (그리고 저도 뿌요 유저인데 테트한테 많이 져요..)
뿌요뿌요도 재밌고 아이템이나 빅뱅 모드도 있고 혼자서 할 수 있는 어드벤쳐랑 봇전도 잇으니 같이 할 사람 좀 생기면 좋겠네여.

그리고 아쉬운게 딱 한가지 있는데 전체적인 뿌테 밸런스 조정은 안 바라니까 클럽 방설정으로라도 밸런스 설정하게 해주면 좋겠다.. 추천해준 친구랑 하는데 뿌요 공격력이 너무 쎄서 테트가 고인물이거나 뿌요 운이 오지게 나쁜거 아닌 이상 이길 수가 없음.
그래서 추천해준 친구가 이제 저랑 뿌테하길 피함,,ㅋㅋㅋ 미안해 나도 테트리스 할게 ㅠㅠㅠㅠ

author: {'steamid': '76561198124445301', 'num_games_owned': 219, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 947, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 862, 'last_played': 1636831267}
review:
Esto sera algo controversial pero aqui la reseña: El juego iba a estar lanzado despues de Puyo Puyo 7 en japon pero debido a las reglas de SEGA de sacar 2 años y medio de sacar el juego nos sacaron Puyo 20TH, por eso se nota casi unos rasgos. Tengo tanto quejas como buenas.

Lo Bueno:
- Graficos y fondos muy buenos
- La jugabilidad se Mantiene de los Puyos que nos deja acostumbrados
- El modo Online para jugar con amigos y otros del mundo aunque es casi escaso en la versión de Steam
- Algunos modos como el SWAP son muy divertidos

Lo Malo:
- Música olvidable y algunos refritos del 20 Aniversario
- Trama mala (ejemplo la flanderizacion de los personajes principales, los Tetra Crew no hacen absoulatemente nada en la trama, o relleno como el entramiento del mundo 6)
- Desbloqueables a partir de finaizar el mundo 4 
- Estrellas que la verdad no sirven de nada y solo te da un logro si los consigues todos pero no hay mucha motivacion de rencompensa
- Dificultad del Modo Aventura Fácil
- DENUVO
- El modo fusión es un desastre
- Barrera de Idioma ya que ingles no se apega casi al Japones haciendo que cambie la situación y cambios de personalidad en personajes claro ejemplo como Sig
Conclusión: La verdad lo veo como un buen juego pero no superior a los juegos de Puyo Puyo, ni tampoco como el mejor crossover porque se siente algunas partes del potencial desperdiciados. Este juego esta ok para empezar entrar a la franquicia. 7/10

review:
Puyo Puyo Tetris is two great puzzle games in one package, with the possibility to play one against the other, or both at the same time, with the computer or other people. This game also includes a decent story made up of 7 main acts and 3 extra ones.
The one small issue I have with this game is how "Puzzle League" can match you with way better players.
Overall, Puyo Puyo Tetris is a very fun title.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008107842', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 925, 'playtime_forever': 404, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 404, 'last_played': 1604116666}
review:
뿌요뿌요만 하고싶었지만 뭐 상관 없나.

테트리스 별로 안좋아해서. 뿌요뿌요만 살까 했는데
없었으면 좋았겠지만 그래도 할만함.
온라인은 애초에 할생각이 없었고.

고인물들이야 온라인 매칭을 원할테지만
나는 대전 하고싶던것도 아니고
그냥 뿌요뿌요 하고싶었던것 뿐이라
그냥 싱글 스토리나 아케이드가 괜찮은거 같음

뭐 잠깐씩 하는 게임이 될테니 
나는 충분히 만족함.

author: {'steamid': '76561198277181291', 'num_games_owned': 217, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 6280, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4155, 'last_played': 1708478176}
review:
As much as I love this game (and I really do!), it's hard to go back to Puyo Puyo Tetris after playing standalone tetris games like tetr.io and nullpomino. The pieces lock in and top out near the top rather than giving extra headroom for rotating, there are no settings for DAS/ARR, and the time it takes for a line to clear makes any method other than tetrises almost futile for sprint. As a pure tetris game, you can do much much better for free. 


In addition, the balance between tetris and puyo puyo is also not very good. The tetris player seemingly has to work a good deal harder than the puyo player to match the amount of garbage being sent (at least at my level of play), and getting a perfect clear start in puyo (which is pure and simple luck) guarantees a tetris player to the grave as long as the puyo player knows what they're doing. As a puyo puyo game, this *was* your best shot, until PP Champions came out. 


The game does not function very well as pure tetris, is an average Puyo Puyo game, and is mediocre at mashing them up. However as it is, this game is still awesome. The characters are charming and cute (Feli gang!), and the spells are pretty much the only reason I still choose to return to Puyo Puyo Tetris. I really, from the bottom of my heart, hope that Puyo Puyo Tetris 2 can improve upon the mistakes that are present in Puyo Puyo Tetris 1 as well as improving upon it's strengths. 


(This review is from the perspective of a pure Tetris player, so take most of my talk about Puyo Puyo with a grain of salt.)

author: {'steamid': '76561197962348121', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1425, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 603, 'last_played': 1672227459}
review:
Too many cheaters online...
 the game is great, and it has multiplayer, but the matchmaking is broken. it either pairs you with someone who is
vastly superior, or someone using a cheating bot. its pretty obvious on tetris when someone is cheating but its extremely
difficult to tell on the puyo side. its very frustrating because you get to play very few legitimate players online, and you
wade through a sea of cheaters. 

(here's what to look for: their screen name is jibberish/non-distinct, they fast drop every piece with no pause/with out looking, cloud up the field and clear it with impossible T-Spin combo moves) 

not to mention the Puyo V Tetris is EXTREMELY unbalanced, if you are elite at puyo, or hell even just good enough to beat the solo on the hardest difficulty, you can beat any tetris player. just string together 2 5+ combos and their screen is done.

 i wish they would fix match making, i would play " low tier " players all night, and let the cheaters sink 100s of hours climbing the ranking system. its so pointless, i don't even get how you can derive enjoyment from watching a bot play...

author: {'steamid': '76561198822036645', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 3705, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 322, 'last_played': 1704048369}
review:
Eu nunca pensei que poderia jogar esses dois estilos de puzzle juntos. Também nunca pensei que até Tetris o Japão transformaria em um Battle Anime! 
A história no modo aventura é bem fraquinha – pra alguém como eu que nunca jogou os jogos da franquia Puyo Puyo deixou a desejar – mas dane-se, o importante que é o jogo é excelente. 
É claro que deixa a desejar em algumas coisas como o desbalanceamento entre Puyo vs Tetris vice versa, mas, em minha opinião, é algo que com treino e habilidade você pode superar.   
Pra quem gosta de jogos puzzle, Puyo Puyo e/ou Tetris, esse crossover é uma benção da SEGA.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044043362', 'num_games_owned': 1561, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 9372, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5479, 'last_played': 1612590137}
review:
[h1]テトリスとぷよぷよ、2大パズルゲームの最強タッグ！！[/h1]

テトリス、それはテトリミノと呼ばれるブロックを横一列に揃えると消せる老舗パズルゲームである。
ぷよぷよ、それはぷよと呼ばれる生き物を4つくっつけると消せる日本発パズルゲームである。

この有名パズルゲームがタッグを組んで対戦できる様になってしまったのが本作。
2種類のパズルゲームを組み合わせて作られたいろいろな対戦モードは
初心者から玄人まで楽しめるよう設計されている。
オンライン対戦もローカル対戦も遊べるのでフレンドとワイワイ、
家族とワイワイ遊べるのもポイント高し。

もうすぐ2も出るとからしいので、まずはお試しで遊んでみるのも良いかもしれない。
（日本語は対応してないけど直感で遊べるよ）

review:
This game is a bad port. It is missing key content for which I had bought the game.

I own Puyo Puyo Tetris on PS Vita, Nintendo Switch & PS4. I love Tetris & I love this game (the proper version that other platforms received).

Somehow the PC version is missing huge pieces of content. Most notably it does not have quick play which offered a way to play normal solo Tetris.

Sorry Sega, if you want my money (again) make this port 100% identical to the superior versions available on other platforms.

author: {'steamid': '76561198165163729', 'num_games_owned': 36, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 435, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 292, 'last_played': 1704594641}
review:
I'm here to tell you the truth, tell you I'm nervous, tell you my story, tell you I'm worth it, tell you all my flaws and my thoughts and my doubts and give you my heart and whats left of it now; Tell you my hurt, tell you my pain, tell you all the thoughts I keep trapped in my brain, tell you that nothings the same tell you I'm nothing much more than a man and tell I fear I may never find love; tell you I'm getting in touch with above and right now I can't deny that I'm scared all this music won't compare or warrant the buzz. 

To summarize my points, Puyo Puyo™Tetris© is as good as it gets when it comes to dog fighting, and when we all get together, what do we really have as a people? Fear? Or are we simply meant to burn! Well this game is just what I need for you to have in your steam cart to buy right now for the low low low price of [REDACTED]!!!!

review: As somebody who is horrible at Puyo Puyo and just decent at Tetris, I love this game. Even without touching online matches, the story mode kept me coming back for the charming character design, music, and silly scenarios you go through in the world of Puyo Puyo. Definitely recommend to anyone who likes puzzle games and fun, lighthearted stories with cute character design.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031562072', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 6272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6250, 'last_played': 1608927874}
review:
This is probably the only good official tetris game with matchmaking. The matchmaking is awful though, probably due to lack of players.

I personally prefer tetris on other platforms since I am not used to the DAS/ARR of PPT. I'm also not used to das charging so my play is significantly slower than on "fast" games. That said, this is probably one of the highest skill cap tetris games where you have to not only be good at downstacking garbage but you also have to be efficient and learn movement mechanics.

There is for sure a devoted playerbase and are some of the top tetris players in the world and it is always interesting to play against them. For a slow game I prefer this game over other ones like T99 and TDS.

author: {'steamid': '76561198124768217', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 12049, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11391, 'last_played': 1697897709}
review:
빠요엔 때문에 고인물 게임의 대명사가 되었지만, 오히려 진입장벽이 가장 낮은 게임중 하나라고 생각한다.

철권이나 롤, 기타 FPS게임은 아무리 CPU와 대전하면서 연습해봤자 PVP 들어가면 개찢기기 마련이지만

뿌테는 내가 할 일만 잘하면 되는 게임이라 1년동안 CPU하고 연습한 사람도 얼마든지 실력발휘가 가능하다.

연습도 실력도 없이 맨몸으로 대전 돌리면서 쳐발렸다고 고인물겜 운운하는 유저들은 그저 한심할 뿐이다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198927806872', 'num_games_owned': 628, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 3116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 627, 'last_played': 1701281733}
review:
The voice acting in this game (english and japanese respectively) just fucking sucks, it makes my head hurt and it's really hard to stop myself to beat up anime children to death. The story makes no sense whatsoever either.
Other than that it's a good puzzler with friends.

author: {'steamid': '76561198340193491', 'num_games_owned': 224, 'num_reviews': 112, 'playtime_forever': 649, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 636, 'last_played': 1599936062}
review:
Tetris review (i dont like or wanna play puyo puyo)
The game is fine, its pure tetris fun with lots of modes, the game had some real problems with frame drops on my i5 / gtx 1060 / 16gb ram, it seemed to stutter for no reason at random points but it was only for 30 seconds or so, the main menu is even worse, the frame drops are very present. My other 2 issues is (1) the voices in the game are so annoying and i wished there was an option to disable them and (2) the UI was a little strange and funky to navigate. I really do enjoy playing tetris so i am able to look past the problems. The 2nd game will be releasing soon so if your not up for what this game has for 15 pounds, you might wanna wait. Overall i think its great, pure tetris gameplay and fun

author: {'steamid': '76561199063979509', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 31612, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15193, 'last_played': 1608721508}
review:
온라인 대전이 엉터리다. 컨텐츠는 훌륭하지만 온갖 버그와 잘못된 구현이 재미를 떨어뜨린다. 온라인 대전은 매칭 시스템도 이상해서 게임 안 하고 도망가는 상대만 보게 된다. 겨우 매칭해서 하더라도 네트워크 상태에 따라 랜덤하게 지연이 들어가며 키 입력도 종종 무시된다.

이 게임을 즐길 거면 온라인은 무시하고 로컬로만 즐기는 게 낫다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198205953947', 'num_games_owned': 1910, 'num_reviews': 374, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1612513861}
review: 뇨끼뇨끼

author: {'steamid': '76561197994340980', 'num_games_owned': 99, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1042, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 673, 'last_played': 1622848653}
review:
Es un muy buen juego si sabes jugar a este tipo de tetris, en mi caso que son novato la verdad que no me divierte para nada.
El match contra otros jugados no existe, te toca contra el primero que este disponible, tengo rango bajo y me toca contra otros que estan en el top.
La verdad es que no es divertivo jugar contra alguien que en 1 min te llena la barra y te mata, y uno esta tratando de aprender.

Cero evolución, lo consejos que te da en los tutoriales son muy forzados, cuando uno juega nunca le va a salir lo que muestran en los tutoriales.

Lo recomiendo si son muy muy bueno en el tipo de tetris battle, si no lo sos como en mi caso que me gusta mas el clasico de hacer puntos, la verdad que no lo compres porque te vas a frustrar en ves de divertirte.

Y despues de escribir este comentario, paso a la desinstalacion del juego.

Si en algun momento veo que estas cosas, como el match cambian o ponen un modo de tetris normal, lo volvere a instalar, hasta ese momento va a seguir juntando polvo digital en mi biblioteca.

author: {'steamid': '76561198176092179', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 240, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 240, 'last_played': 1594348854}
review:
I know it doesn't look like I have a whole lot of time here, but that's a bit deceptive, so just hear me out.

Honestly, I was excited when I heard about this game the first time. I've been a long time fan of both the Puyo Puyo games and Tetris, so this was naturally going to be something I'd enjoy, right? Right.

I do have some issues with it (that are hopefully going to be fixed when PPT2 comes out), but I'll get to those later.

I've been a long-time fan of puzzle games, as I've implied and this has its ups and downs. Puyo Puyo and Tetris game modes both play the way you'd expect them to if you're familiar with the modern versions. I've never been a fan of the party mode here, but I can see how some people would have fun with it. Big Bang mode is pretty simple, but it's good for helping you see Puyo chains and exotic Tetris spins with some practice.

The bad thing of this game? It's un-balanced in versus mode. Not only does the Puyo field fill quicker, the pieces drop slower, lock-in slower, and the attacks do less damage. Add into the fact that the Puyo garbage doesn't attack like Tetris garbage does and you're looking at an uphill battle; two players of the same skill playing different modes in versus will have the Tetris player winning 95% of the time.

Would I recommend it? Hell yeah! Just keep in mind that there's going to be some bulls--t times if you ever decide to play online against other players for one reason or another.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039904607', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 6121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5134, 'last_played': 1654888272}
review: This is an official Tetris game with an interesting premise but some significant flaws that make it pretty hard to take PPT seriously. Missed inputs during garbage-send animations, and a bizarre matchmaking algorithm make for a totally chaotic and punishing time in Puzzle League for Tetris players from other flavors. As one of the biggest and most polished official Tetris "vs." titles, PPT misses the mark in a frustrating and disappointing way.

author: {'steamid': '76561198335309460', 'num_games_owned': 112, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 2899, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2435, 'last_played': 1681526613}
review:
after 41 hours i can say that this game is very much worth it, with a story mode and several other modes  it could satisfy even a casual single player experience. with plenty of things to work for, from alternate voice packs to different skins for your puyos and tetraminos. 

 however i would like to say that in higher forms of play i found myself very annoyed at how week puyo puyo is against a tetris. Tetris is much faster than puyo puyo, this is an issue with the online mode especially. I have not been able to play Puyo V Puyo matches, now a counterpoint would be to play puyo puyo champions, however to some that seems rather unappealing due to the game's relatively small playerbase

overall i would recommend this game to casual players, newcommers to the series, and tetris players looking for a slight change, and even general puyo puyo fans. However i would not recommend this game at all if you only want it for online puyo vs puyo matches.

however these issues seem to have been fixed in its sequel, which is launching within the coming months

author: {'steamid': '76561198141339885', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 12173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9378, 'last_played': 1700915048}
review:
不推荐不代表这游戏不好

（以下可能极大程度包含个人感性因素，请酌情选择性阅读）
——————————————————————————————
游戏缺点
·游戏优化极差 极其容易掉线与崩溃
·服务器流畅度堪忧 依据个人地区而言 跨地区的对战的延迟特别大
·评分系统做的极差 高水平玩家进入升分极慢 对战中途拔线不会计负 另一方会一直加载等到心态爆炸直接退出 而且还会扣分 没有别的解决方法

游戏特性
·游戏价格较高 不经常打折
·了解规则容易 上手难 进步缓慢（可能是经典硬核游戏的特点）
·游戏粘性较高 对喜欢其他作品的玩家可能有一定的吸引力
·不是所有游戏模式都适用高对抗性的竞技类玩法（有些游戏模式更适合休闲）
·仅能使用游戏内自带的规则及自带的参数修改的模式（并没有创意工坊这种东西）
·因为游戏玩法存在一定的随机性与水平差异带来的不平衡性（由只玩家来承担与不同模式玩家对抗的风险）

游戏优点
·独创的游戏玩法
·主线剧情不错（仅对个人而言）
·创新的UI设计 配套动画与角色设计完善 有系列作品的风格
——————————————————————————————
游戏评测仅作为参考，请根据自己实际情况决定是否购买

author: {'steamid': '76561198404841738', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 891, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 891, 'last_played': 1595469662}
review: Compre el juego porque soy fanático del tetris. Quería amigarme con el puyo puyo y la verdad que no pude.  El juego es simple y cumple. Tiene variedad de modos, algunos novedosos que juntan ambos juegos. La historia realmente es testimonial, está ahí, la verdad que no era necesaria y no suma. El en el online cuesta encontrar jugadores a tu mismo nivel, hay mayoría de jugadores de Asia y estos juegos son como el pin-pon. Es imposible ganarles. Técnicamente el juego luce bonito y cumple. Recomiendo si te gustan los dos juegos. Sino ir por otro lado. Valoración 6.5/10.-

review: Hra samotná je totálně rozbitá, s konstantními pády, lagy, nefunkčním multiplayerem a podváděním jednodušším než v CS:GO. Na Orloji budete aspoň na čestvém vzduchu.

review:
As drogas são as piores coisas que você queira para a sua vida.

Esse ato horrível de usar drogas pode causar muitas coisas ruins. As drogas causam: delírios, problemas respiratórios, machucados na boca, falta de apetite e outras doenças graves e prejudiciais à saúde.

Se alguma vez, um dependente de drogas vier te oferecer o produto, seja confiante e diga “não”.

A sua família e os amigos podem te ajudar a combater o uso de drogas, mas não ande com colegas que usam drogas, pois eles podem tentar te influenciar. Se caso acontecer de um conhecido seu usar drogas, você já sabe o que fazer, diga não a essa atitude e o apóie para combater as drogas.

Diga não às drogas!!!

review: Recomendado para os fãs de Puyo Puyo (quem jogou o Dr Robotiniks Mean Bean Machine no Mega Drive vai gostar também) e para os fãs de Tetris e para os entusiastas do gênero puzzle. Super divertido com modos muito variados e competitivos, incluindo mescla entre os jogos Puyo e Tetris durante uma partida. O modo Adventure libera mais personagens. Custo benefício que compensa.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041152095', 'num_games_owned': 83, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 476, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 311, 'last_played': 1604109454}
review:
In english / En español
English*
*Resume: It's Puyo Puyo, a good one, it's Tetris, a good one, with a character base IA, a little story, and that's it, it's a good combination, a good game.*
The mechanics are timeless, endless fun, for both, Tetris and Puyo Puyo.
The tetris part is really good, not like other games that had some problems (Ubi), Puyo Puyo is good too, the addition of characters that had like different experience for both "games", is really good and interesting.
No problems with controller, no problems with online, there was just one time that the game crashed me but i think it wasn't the game it self, it was the memory management.
*I have 5 hours registered but i've been playing offline A LOT*

Español*
*En resumen: Es Puyo Puyo, uno bueno, es Tetris, uno bueno, con IA basada en personajes , una pequeña historia, y eso es todo, una buena combinación, un buen juego.*
Las mecanicas son eternas, diversión sin fin, para ambos, Tetris y Puyo Puyo.
En el caso de Tetris, es muy bueno, no como otros juegos (de Tetris) que han tenido problemas (Como los de Ubi).
Puyo Puyo es bueno, la adición de personajes que tienen diferete "experiencia" para ambos juegos es interesante y bueno.
Ningun problema con controles, ningun problema online, solo hubo una vez que el juego crasheo pero creo que no fue problema del juego en si, si no que fue el manejador de memoria de Windows.
*Tengo registradas 5 horas pero he estado jugando MUCHO offline*

author: {'steamid': '76561198848136464', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 7411, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 194, 'last_played': 1700911267}
review:
求助
刚买来时运行没什么问题，游玩很流畅，就是一开始闪退了几次，之后平和的玩了3个小时左右（仅指单人），关了。再打开的时候，游戏只有声音，没有画面，尝试过多次的验证完整性以及重装游戏，并没有用。然后，从上次游戏正常运行到第一次故障做过的行为，游戏本身的话，只调整过窗口化运行，别的都不值一提，离线运行和在线运行表现一致，一般不是网络问题。
点不推荐主要是因为不点其中一个不能评论，我真心很喜欢这个游戏，所以希望在看评论的大佬能够提出一些解决的方法和建议，不胜感激

author: {'steamid': '76561198035357863', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 3067, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 319, 'last_played': 1669833980}
review: The story mode is a thown together voice acted anime trope, but the gameplay is addicting and fast paced. The switch between puyo puyo and tetris makes your brain work in different ways, and then when they blend them together, it throws it all on it's head. I really enjoy skilling all the dialogue and muting the bgm and just grinding on sorting little colors into different configurations. The chain function is really engaging, i feel like the game does a good job of training you to play it well. My friend got this game and I had so much fun playing it, i couldn't help but to get it for myself.

review: I played Tetris for about 6-7 years now, so I was quite devastated when you couldn't play it online for free anymore but this is a good alternative. I'm not really good so it doesn't matter to me whether I can play with others or not. I just enjoy Tetris single player as a pass time offline and it really brings back some old memories. Recommend if you like Tetris and arcade games, y'know 'cause it's an old game :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198123955602', 'num_games_owned': 143, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 431, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 431, 'last_played': 1597102966}
review: Estaba re emocionado cuando lo compre, pero el matchmaking es horrible. Empezas con 2000 puntos y te  hacen match con gente top 3 del mundo, en un segundo te ganan, no tiene sentido, es horrible y super estresante, no se puede disfrutar, super desigual, asi no se sube nunca, real que si jugas con alguien con el mismo puntaje se nota porque es una pelea constante (y esto no pasa nunca) pero con alguien top 3, no se puede, es imposible, no se disfruta el juego asi, encima no lo van a mejorar porque ya tiene tiempo desde que salio. Si se estresan facil no lo compren. No lo recomiendo para nada.

author: {'steamid': '76561198442460376', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 458, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 458, 'last_played': 1596735257}
review:
I play tetris since long time. tetris friends, tetris classics, netris kombat, and now tetris effects. This puyo  puyo game, is one of the most horrible versions of tetris  i ever saw. Dsync is horrible on the response of your pieces vs other tetris online, because it affects your input response.
Colors and themes are not customizable, so there is not a night mode. Match making is unfair because is random and you finish up playing with someone who has much more high level than you, or much more low level. This game doesnt worth the money they asking, lets rank down this horrible game is disrespectful for all the tetris community being the only option in steam, and this is sad.

review:
[b]Edit: Couch Multiplayer is especially good in this version of Tetris for two reasons: 1) Heaps of game modes. 2) Your buddy may actually enjoy Puyo more than Tetris/Puyo is a skill equalizer[/b]

This is the go-to game for Tetris fans right now. Well polished mechanics and the Puyo aspect is not intrusive if your looking to play Tetris exclusively
Online is great, though be aware that most online opponents will be very skilled

Puyo is actually very fun, it took me a few months to get used to the gameplay of puyo, initially it made my head hurt, but now Its quiet enjoyable to play.

Story/Adventure Mode is decent, mainly geared towards kids and young teens.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198388802709', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 91231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84422, 'last_played': 1675339739}
review:
누구에게나 추천할 수 있는 게임은 아니지만 취향 맞고 한번 재미 붙이면 거의 평생 즐길 수 있다. 

실력 올라가는 재미로 하는 게임인데 처음할 때는 실력 올라가는 게 잘 느껴지지 않고 고인물에게 압살당하기만 하므로 처음이 제일 고비다. 그래서 처음 접했을 때 바로 인터넷 대전을 하지 말고 혼자 연습하거나 컴퓨터하고 대전해서 실력을 늘린 다음에 인터넷 대전으로 가는 것을 추천한다. 굳이 처음부터 인터넷 대전을 하고 싶다면 상대를 고를 수가 있으니 고인물과의 대전은 되도록 피하는게 좋다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198398609794', 'num_games_owned': 12, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 9404, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6327, 'last_played': 1626272496}

author: {'steamid': '76561198057988642', 'num_games_owned': 154, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 9591, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6293, 'last_played': 1692779586}
review:
I bought PPT as a Tetris player, and came out just as much a puyo player -- if not more.

Surrounded by a wealth of fun and vibrant characters, and filled with extremely solid game mechanics, PPT is a phenomenal game -- solid enough to be eSports-viable, but not at the expense of casual enjoyment.

"I'm a Tetris player who REALLY couldn't care less about Puyo.  Is this the game for me?"
100% it's the game for you.  You can ignore Puyo to your heart's content, and still have a wonderful time playing with up to 4 players at once.  The only thing to keep in mind is, when playing ranked, you may be forced to play *against* a puyo player (which does, admittedly, require some change in strategy), but you can always choose to play Tetris yourself.

"I'm a Puyo player who couldn't care less about Tetris.  Should I get Puyo Puyo Champions instead?"
Actually...  Yes, you probably should buy Champions.  If you -- nor the people you might want to play with -- have 0% interest in Tetris, then this isn't the ideal game.  While mechanically, PPT and PPC are all but identical, PPC has several quality of life changes and overall refinements that make it the ideal Puyo vs Puyo experience (as well as being the game of choice for hardcore Puyo players).  Also!  Champions has Puyo Puyo Fever, a well-loved alternative way of playing Puyo that isn't present in PPT.

All that being said, this game *is* at its most enjoyable when you can play both Puyo and Tetris.  One of my favorite examples is a game mode called "Swap," in which (every 25 seconds) you and your opponent switch between a Puyo board and a Tetris board.  Not only is this confusing and chaotic (and really fun!), but it also opens up the possibility for antics such as starting a Puyo chain right before swapping, allowing the chain to pop in the background while you add to the combo from your Tetris side.

Now, as far as story mode goes, it is not the best.  Take everything I said about choosing what you play and throw it out the window.  You'll be forced to play every variant of Puyo or Tetris (or both, or combined), and to be honest I found that to be incredibly tedious.  It was enjoyable most of the time (the character interactions are cute), and I'm glad it's there, but that is something to consider.  If story mode is irrelevant to you, and core gameplay is all the matters, then you'll be fine.

All in all, this game is an absolute joy to play.  I encourage anyone and everyone to give it a chance.

At the end of the day, you can play Puyo Puyo, and you can play Tetris, both of which are in one of their most refined releases to date.  You can't really go wrong.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055511108', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2855, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2583, 'last_played': 1613705519}
review:
Can Wholeheartedly recommend this to both Kids and Adults. Great with friends or by your lonesome. Recommend starting out with the Tutorial before jumping into Solo Arcade. Beware of the Multiplayer: There are many other great players out there who will not be afraid to punish first-timers for lack of knowledge regarding advanced Tetris or Puyo Puyo Tactics. Do Your Research and Practice Practice PRACTICE before jumping into Multiplayer or Story Mode. Only Compliant I have of this game is the High Difficulty Curve that the Single Player Campaign Possesses. If you are not prepared or well-versed in the various Gamemodes, you are in for a very rough time, and expect to get stuck around Chapters 3-5. Overall, Great Game, Okay Story with Amazing Characters, and Worth Every Penny to Buy. If you can get this on a Sale, Do so. Otherwise, $20 Well-Spent.

You can find me on YouTube at SoundFX09. I occasionally post Puyo Puyo Tetris and Puyo Puyo Champions Videos.

SoundFX09, Signing Out!

author: {'steamid': '76561198097590274', 'num_games_owned': 312, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 1637, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 508, 'last_played': 1627163856}
review:
É difícil estragar Tetris, mas a Sega conseguiu.

O foco do jogo está nas batalhas contra outros jogadores. Até há um modo aventura para um jogador, mas mesmo neste modo o foco está em bater oponentes controlados pelo computador. O modo Endless do Tetris original fica meio escondido, dentro da opção Marathon, o que é desnecessariamente confuso. Além disso, o modo Endless tem um limite de velocidade; para no nível 15, o que ainda é fácil o suficiente pra continuar jogando e jogando. Nem chega perto de ter o nível de desafio que o Tetris de NES tinha. Ah, e tem Puyo Puyo também. Acaba sendo até um bônus legalzinho, e o modo Fusion que mistura Tetris e Puyo Puyo tem suas qualidades, mas não vale a pena comprar o jogo só por isso.

A pior parte é o modo Versus online. A Sega simplesmente achou que era uma boa alternativa deixar as pessoas jogarem livremente online sem ter a opção de filtrar o nível dos jogadores. Assim, a sua primeira partida pode ser logo contra uma pessoa experiente e você não teria a menor chance de vencer. Isso, claro, se você achar alguém pra jogar contra. Até que não é tão difícil encontrar alguém pra jogar contra você no modo Puzzle League, mas boa sorte pra encontrar alguém pra jogar no modo Free Play.

Existem diversas versões melhores de Tetris, e gratuitas, ainda por cima. Até dá pra se divertir tentando conseguir as conquistas, e o modo aventura serve pra passar o tempo por algumas horinhas, mas no geral não recomendo o jogo. Modo Endless péssimo, os modos online são implementados sem considerar o ranking dos jogadores e, no geral, a sensação é de que perderam uma chance e tanto. Não é um jogo ruim, mas eu não recomendo.

review:
I got this game because I wanted to play Tetris and potentially play it in multiplayer.

Ended up getting introduced to Puyo Puyo as well.

The random anime characters might annoy people who don't like that sort of thing, but I don't really mind.

Base price seems a bit high but, hey, it also has a lot of voice acting and features that you can gradually unlock.  Considering how expensive a lot of games are these days...

If you love Tetris like I do, get this one.  Puyo Puyo is pretty cool I guess

EDIT:  About 8 hours of playtime later, I'm finally making decent progress in this game.  Though that probably describes my lack of competence wondrously, it also fortifies the concept of a game becoming more engaging as one gets better at it.  So my recommendation is only more enthusiastic now.  Even if you suck at Puyo Puyo like I do, get this one!

author: {'steamid': '76561198049598913', 'num_games_owned': 290, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1429, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1245, 'last_played': 1663358369}
review:
The days of us Western Puyo fans having to resort to imports is finally over. Puyo is finally here to stay for us!

If I am not mistaken, this is the first Puyo Puyo game to have been localised for the West since 2004's Puyo Pop Fever and only the third as a whole to have made it to us unaltered. I am pleased to announce we got the best game we could've asked for to kickstart the renaissance of the series in the West.

Obviously one of the biggest draws of the game is in its very title:It is Puyo Puyo AND Tetris. A truly legendary, once-in-a-lifetime combination of two of the best puzzle game series ever made. For the price, you are getting these two superficially similar puzzle game styles in one very convenient package: the colourful 4-blob-matching chain-reacting gameplay of Puyo (complete with two separate rule styles: the simpler, more competitive Puyo 2 style and the far more elaborate, gimmicky Fever style) and the brick-stacking line-clearing gameplay of Tetris, fully embracing all of its different competitive quirks such as T-Spins and chaining line clears. You can even do versus between the two styles, and it's very fun and quite amazing how they managed to make it work as seamlessly as it does!

As far as gameplay goes, that is about it. The game is exactly what it says on the tin and it's very fun. I believe that, for a mostly unchanging, long-running series with relatively simple gameplay rules like both Puyo and Tetris happen to be, it makes more sense to evaluate what is AROUND the gameplay rather than just the game itself. At the end of the day, albeit a very nice and convenient package to have these two games done so well and together at last, odds are you have played Tetris or a Puyo-styled game before, and it will not really differ at all from how this one handles that aspect. Although obviously how the game plays is the most important part to consider for any purchase of a video game, most people are not going to just buy this game to get Puyo and Tetris action on a vacuum. 

Before buying this game, you have to ask yourself this question: Are you here JUST for the gameplay and nothing else, or are you here for the story, content, characters, presentation and everything else? If you just want a good game to practice for competitive Puyo Puyo specifically, I shall direct you to purchasing Puyo Puyo Champions instead: very similar, but cheaper and much better optimised for competitive Puyo gameplay than this game is. That game is MUCH lighter on content than this one is (it's just Puyo, for one, no Tetris), but if you want a Puyo game you can grind as an e-sport, that one will be a much better investment. You will not really mind the missing features all that much.

If you value content over competitive optimisation, you'll much prefer getting this game instead. It comes with 3 main modes of play: Adventure, Solo/Multiplayer Arcade and Online Multiplayer. Solo/Multiplayer Arcade simply lets you start a match with any character you currently have unlocked with any set of rules you wish, either alone or with a friend and with up to 3 CPU controller characters. Online MP is fun and mostly unaffected by lag, although it's sadly rather inactive, nowadays..

Adventure is the story mode, divided in 7 acts of 10 levels each for the main story, with 3 more acts opening up after finishing it. Every level has different gameplay rules (any combination of a challenge or versus with either Puyo and/or Tetris) and goals to beat. Beating those goals (usually score or time limits) awards you with stars for that level, with 3 being the maximum. Getting 3 stars in every level will be necessary to complete the game 100%. If you consider yourself to be unskilled in Puyo or Tetris, don't be discouraged, as overall the story mode is very easy to clear. 70 levels for the story mode sounds like a lot, but if you don't care for getting 3 stars in every level, you will probablly finish it in about 5 hours. Even then, getting 3 stars in every level isn't usually difficult until very late into the game when a brand new game mode, Fusion (where you play Puyo and Tetris at the same time), is rather inelegantly forced on you and the requirements for a 3 star are upped severely. 

The story itself is... rather unimportant. It is just an excuse plot to get the characters to interact in quirky situations. I don't think stressing over it matters, as the storytelling really isn't what you are here for. It's more important to focus on what's actually being presented with the story than the storyline itself, which is the humour and the characters. The game is, in my opinion, very funny. It's pretty quotable and full of silly lines from all the characters. Thankfully, if you are a newcomer to the series, not much of it hinges on you being familiar with the characters, so you can dive right in no problem. This isn't necessarily a style of humour everyone will appreciate, though. Some will definitely make the argument that the jokes are overdone or forced, and it's easy to think of some of them as a bit childish. Even with a character (Schezo) that is pretty much dedicated to being the personification of out-of-context dirty jokes, the overall humour of the game will still give off a vibe of being "kid friendly". Transitioning into the characters but still in relation to humour, if you are the OPPOSITE, however, coming from the older games into this one, you're definitely going to get the feeling the characters have been flanderised. The old school characters (especially the old series' protagonist Arle) will feel like they had any semblance of edge blasted away as they've been reduced to rather cartoonish exaggerations of their older selves. This will definitely impact your enjoyment of the humour if you're coming into this expecting Arle to still have a razor sharp tongue, or for rather awkward pervy jokes to be strewn around the dialogue at random. The character designs,as a whole,are excellent,and the series has a now iconic, highly stylised and expressive art style that really makes it stand out. It's good to see the art style now refined to near perfection, as some of the previous entries of the series had some characters definitely get the short end of the stick with the new style. I am pleased to say it's not the case in this game, as all characters look really cute, distinct and expressive. Still, it's not all winners, however. Although thankfully no character has to suffer through having sloppily drawn portraits this time around, the original characters representing Tetris in this game, while they don't look bad, are just not as interesting or colourful as any of the established Sega and Compile characters.

One thing you'll notice a lot about the characters more than anything else is their voices. I am glad that we have the option to toggle between English and Japanese voices, always a welcome addition. It's also very good to see that the English dub is pretty good. However, even the most open minded among us is probably, at some point, going to get really tired of them if you play this game a lot. The cutscenes have a rather decent amount of dialogue, but you'll mostly hear them during chains/line clears as you're playing the game, where they will talk almost constantly. It'll become impossible to ignore how overly squeaky a lot of characters sound if you chose the Japanese dub. If you're an older fan of the series, you'll especially notice how the voices of the characters have gotten higher pitched with every installment,to the point where the next step down from the JP voice acting in this game is having them be voiced by middle schoolers. It's rather sad... I don't feel like the voice acting needs to be this overbearing. I don't think it's as big of a problem with the English dub, but the characters will still speak every bit as much during matches.

I still highly recommend this game. Very fun and full of unlockable content!

author: {'steamid': '76561198097643243', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 634, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 634, 'last_played': 1520515605}
review:
ゲームとして認めたくないぐらいに甚だしい出来損ないです。

まず現行機種と比べてロードが長い
何故PCなのにロードが遅いのか理解が出来ません。

次にラグや動作不良の発生頻度
対戦時にはほぼ高確率でラグが発生することに加えて、
ボイスが不具合起こしたりとデバッグ作業を怠ったとしか思えないバグの発生率

最後に何故か日本語が導入されていない
正直問題はないといえば問題ないが、データ内にはしっかりと日本語データが残っている為、
日本人に媚びを売るよりも外人に媚びを売るという選択をしたとしか思えない開発陣の裏切り
現在は直っているはずですが、日本語音声にしても英語音声で喋るバグもあったりと
本当になんでこんな値段で売りつけたのか腹立たしい出来でした。

SEGAはTetris側に謝罪するレベルでこのゲームは最悪です。

author: {'steamid': '76561198287547494', 'num_games_owned': 1012, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2815, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1963, 'last_played': 1667854696}
review:
I got introduced in Puyo Puyo when I was 8 years old. 
My cousin brought her Playstation 2 with her Puyo Puyo Fever Game and we played it together.... 
and oh boy, I got so hooked with Puyo Puyo! This game is just too cute and fun!
I started to try playing the older Puyo Puyo games and they were good, but the Puyo Puyo Fever stayed special for me. I just totally love the fever mode plus it was the first Puyo Puyo game I played so it was easily my favorite Puyo Puyo game.
 
Until, I saw this game as upcoming release... I felt hyped. "A Puyo Puyo game coming here in Steam! Woohoo!"
I was so happy when I saw this game that I didn't hesitate to pre-order it here in Steam (I usually don't pre-order games. This is my first pre-order one.) ...and wow, I didn't know I'd love this game even way more than Puyo Puyo Fever.

I feel like I'm playing my childhood game yet it's something new!
I love the Puyo Puyo + Tetris together in a game as a concept.
Now, it's been 2 years since the release and I'm still having fun when I play this game casually from time to time.
I have no regrets purchasing this game!

I'd definitely recommend Puyo Puyo fans to get this game.
And if you're new to Puyo Puyo Series,... no problem!
The Puyo Puyo Champions has no story mode because it's more for PvP, but Puyo Puyo Tetris has a story mode and that will make you get to know and like the Puyo Puyo characters so I recommend to get this one first as a new player.

If you ever end up not being into playing Puyo Puyo mode, Playing in Tetris mode is still very fun and worth it so I recommend this game to everyone! Buy this game if you think it's interesting!

PS: The League Matches can be overwhelming because there's too many veteran players in this game. 
But you can just ignore the League Matches and play this game casually if you find League Matches too hard and frustrating. This game is fun even you play it in non-competitive mode!

author: {'steamid': '76561198248795820', 'num_games_owned': 197, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 6900, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2092, 'last_played': 1673207310}
review:
Puyo Puyo Tetris, by itself is one of the best Tetris games for steam, so if you just want a really good Tetris game then this is a no-brainer buy at it's cheap price, the controls, animations and aesthetic of the game are solid.

I personally really like the Puyo side of the game, where Tetris is very much a Game-mode where you can just optimise speed and learn to do T-Spins, Puyo Puyo is a game-mode in which you always feel like you have to adapt your strategy because of the garbage Puyo that are traded between both players. 

My two biggest criticisms about the game are the online rank inflation at the top end (if your win-rate is 50% your rank still increases), and the story mode, which is very bare bones in terms of unique gameplay to the solo arcade but the voice acting quips are pretty funny.

Overall, I'd recommend!

author: {'steamid': '76561198232581508', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 1667, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 577, 'last_played': 1655596916}
review:
Never thought I would see any version of these games on Steam; let alone an innovative mash-up between the two. I just really love it. Would have liked a standard Tetris-only mode / standard Puyo-Puyo only mode but I kind of understand that they would want to limit that to stand-alone titles for the sake of their bottom-line.

RATING: 9/10
VERDICT: Very fun & engaging. Is always great to see Tetris reinvented & mixing it up with Puyo Puyo was a galaxy-brained idea. Worth more than what I paid for it. (I think I paid ~14$ for my copy through a Humble Bundle sale/subscription discount.) Highly recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089792305', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 821, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 821, 'last_played': 1591930287}
review:
Played the game to make up for the lack of single player in Puyo Puyo championship, and since I could not find anyone who played it online.

Unless your playing with a friend then theirs no one to play but those who devote themselves to it since theirs no real matchmaking mode besides throwing one to the wolves.

It may have the option to tailor a game to your liking for others to join but they will not since anyone only plays ranked.

Really its like paying for half a game unless you got someone to play with or already devoted to this

Playing against Tetris or someone who can exploit "T - Spin" a shoddily explained mechanic in the game with puyo or simply not vesting yourself in hours to learn it well enjoy one sided games which are no fun.   It's the equivelant of those who hate to enjoy a challenge so why not just exploit or play the better choice?

If it wasn't for the single player and some humorous dialogue I would give it a hard pass.  Get it if your a fan of puzzle games but don't expect much out of multiplayer unless you play with a group of friends.

For the aspects that are fun its great, if it had some patches or ability to turn off certian things then sure, but the worst thing any game can be is not fun, and online play is not fun in ranked, even though the option is their if theirs no encouragement to make a room for newbies or puyo or tetris exclusive is involved then whats the point?

Feel a bit jibbed out of half the price of the game or maybe until I can find some others to play with.

Is it the "best puzzle game ever", "perfect", "A great combination"?  

No far from it...it's a science experiment of food you do at like 2 in the morning and then forget about it in your fridge until you have the strange craving for it again.

A 3 out of 5, if you like puzzle games
Tetris
Puyo Puyo
Quirky stories

Snag it at a discount

Dont get it if you want

Balanced gameplay
A ranking system
Evened odds preffering one and not the other.
Being casual when it comes to these games multiplayer.

TLDR:  Funny story haha time, neat gimmick, online bad/boring/unbalanced, find friends or vest time to be gud, not casual friendly.

author: {'steamid': '76561198108016875', 'num_games_owned': 169, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 503, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 243, 'last_played': 1612207528}
review:
Ingredients:

1. 6 tablespoons unsalted butter
2. 1/2 cup white sugar
3. 1/2 cup brown sugar
4. 1/4 cup water
5. 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon
6. 1 pinch salt
7. 5 apples - peeled, cored and sliced
8. 1 pastry for double-crust pie

Directions:

1. Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
2. Combine butter, white sugar, brown sugar, water, cinnamon, and salt in a saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil, remove from heat and set aside.
3. Roll out half the pastry to fit a 9-inch pie plate. Place bottom crust in pie plate; pour in apple slices.
4. Roll out top crust into a 10-inch circle. Cut into 8 (1-inch) wide strips with a sharp paring knife or pastry wheel. Weave the pastry strips, one at a time, into a lattice pattern. Fold the ends of the lattice strips under the edge of the bottom crust and crimp to seal.
5. Pour butter-sugar mixture over top of pie, coating the lattice, and allowing any remaining sauce to drizzle through the crust.
6. Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and bake until the crust is golden brown, the caramel on the top crust is set, and the apple filling is bubbling, 35 to 40 more minutes. Allow to cool completely before slicing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012914502', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1426, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1291, 'last_played': 1686167739}
review:
A very cutesy and addictive take on Tetris and Puyo Puyo. The different gamemodes offer a wide variety of accessibility for both Puyo and Tetris players, with the swap mode being a personal favourite of mine. The game is highly polished and feels good to play in both styles, and the characters are memorable to those who have played previous Puyo games. The adventure mode, while easy, is full of innuendos and is incredibly funny.

However, despite the game attempting to be accessible to newer players with a few tutorials, there are a lot of advanced techniques that are not taught in depth, and require external information. Any newer player who tries to play online nowadays will likely be destroyed by the same rank 9000 Ghanan Schezo main.

Otherwise, a great edition of Tetris and Puyo to play with friends, though I'd recommend Puyo Champions if you'd rather play that exclusively.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014571385', 'num_games_owned': 54, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 3465, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 976, 'last_played': 1624175586}
review:
玩得时间不是特别长，游戏本身很不错，玩起来画面和配音的质量都很高，玩法也挺多的，是一款很不错的游戏。我平常也很喜欢看顶级玩家的视频，看起来是相当的刺激。
在这过程中我还是发现这游戏在方块对战噗哟的时候这平衡做的有点太过于偏袒方块了。下面我说说我的个人观点。
1、方块开局的定式PC火力强大而且直接可以送给噗哟方，数量直接能超过噗哟的数量。光是这点方块就已经赢了一半了。而噗哟的全消却不能打过去还得再做连锁才能跟着过去，而此时方块搞个T旋就能抵消，升起来了两三行对方块而言啥问题都不是，火力还增加了非常爽。
2、在游戏机制上方块有绝对的优势。先见5个加hold，火力可存储，那就意味着打后手非常简单。而噗哟只能提前看到两个，你要是运气不好发牌机都能玩死你，更别说是在和别人对战的情况了。方块只要不被顶到头都能继续挖下去，创造火力。脚底下的垃圾就能100%转化成火力。而噗哟要只要关键点被堵掉那就输了，想要做大连锁的噗哟越延长就越危险，你不做就绝对赢不了，到达快顶端的时候方块只要存储好火力顶着噗哟看堵掉他的关键点，然后不断的消2送火力就能轻松取胜。
3、加伤时间，在方块对战噗哟的过程中火力会逐渐变大，开头噗哟想要秒杀能做各种定式大火力的方块是近乎不可能的神技能。那么进入中期噗哟比方块稍微快一点进入加伤，这就是噗哟想要打赢方块唯一的的窗口期了，过了中期到了方块消1行就能送火力给噗哟之后那么噗哟就基本输了，飞速落垃圾的情况下能做出的连锁有限，那么噗哟连锁火力大的优势就发挥不出来了，反之方块一个T旋的火力就能抵消大部分的垃圾，根本不会死。而升上来的垃圾就回到第一条全部转换成加伤后的火力又送回到噗哟方。根据第二条方块能储存火力，只要等着噗哟点火打后手，就很容易获胜了。而噗哟在进入加伤后期后就会慢慢的被消耗殆尽吃一发4层以上垃圾的攻击那就没了。而这点火力在方块进入加伤后那就真的太简单了。而且加伤后噗哟方式没人能打出超过红脸的25行的。而方块能轻易打出到星星月亮以上的超大火力的，噗哟想要抵消这火力就会消耗殆尽，接下来只要方块在加伤的支持下打一个T旋出来再接1、2两的攻击的话噗哟就直接败北，没有任何悬念。
----- 综上所述我觉得这游戏的平衡真的不行。我这里觉得能加进去一点，那就是让噗哟消除垃圾的时候也能转成一定的火力送给方块，这样也只是能稍微减少一点噗哟的劣势。作为一个对抗游戏平衡做好了才能让玩家双方都有良好的游戏体验，一方的游戏优势太大有时候看视频真的觉得噗哟这边很委屈。没办法你游戏就这样子，窗口期也就这么一点点时间，过了你就绝对赢不了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198305295430', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 378, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 316, 'last_played': 1594357808}
review:
Si disfrutabas de juegos que cerraron como TetrisBattle o TetrisFriends y buscas algo parecido lee esto.

Pros: 
(Tetris)
- Las mecánicas son muy similares, también existen los combos y puedes usar técnicas como el t-spin.
- En el online encontrarás en su mayoría gente buena.
- Para subir ranking de forma competitiva está decente.
- Tiene su parte de "aventura" y te puede entretener si buscas algo más casual y para pasar el rato.
(Puyo Puyo) 
- Puedes elegir (en gran parte de los casos) si jugar puyo puyo o tetris e incluso combinarlos.
- Si te gustaba de por si este juego lo seguirás disfrutando, tiene variantes que lo hacen entretenido 
  y también tiene su parte competitiva.

- El arte es bonito y tiene voces en varios idiomas

Contras:
- Si no buscas nada competitivo y entras al online puede que no lo disfrutes mucho, te pueden emparejar con el rango 10 
  de otro país
- A veces se nota que no hay mucha gente, las salas en los modos de juego online pueden estar vacías.
- Al menos yo no siento tan fluido el movimiento, en los juegos que comentaba al inicio podías jugar bastante rápido, si 
  llegaste a ser Dios del tetris en TetrisBattle o rank 25 en TetrisFriends notarás que no podrás jugar igual, aunque si le 
  ves el lado positivo irás más lento pero seguro.
- A veces no te dejan elegir qué modo jugar (Puyo puyo o Tetris) y si no te gusta alguno o eres malo igual tendrás que 
  aguantarte, en mi caso he perdido varias partidas por no ser bueno en puyo puyo xD
- Algunas veces al intentar salir del juego y darle a la X roja vuelve a entrar al menú, imagino es un pequeño bug pero es 
  un poquito molesto ya que la animación es lenta.

Te recomiendo que lo pruebes al menos un rato, y si lo ves en oferta aún mejor, si no te convence siempre puedes hacer refound.
A mi si me gusta, pero sigue sin ser tan bueno como los otros, creo que falta que le den más atención.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071558897', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 93, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 93, 'last_played': 1588366367}
review:
Comprei buscando uma experiência descente no tetris mas me frustrei, sério que isso é o melhor que a Steam tem a oferecer quando se trata de tetris?
-O jogo tem uma aparência extremamente infantil, que por si só não é um problema, o problema é como tudo é genérico e chato, a cada linha que vc faz no jogo o personagem fala algo, tendo por volta de duas falas para singles, doubles, triples e tetrises, após 10 minutos de jogo a voz do personagem já beira o ridículo de irritante devido a vozes fininhas e irritantes.
-As músicas não são legais
-Não é possível customizar os botões se você usa um controle, não gostou de nenhum dos padrões? Problema seu.
Enfim, eu não recomendo, talvez se você também gostar de puyo puyo possa te servir.
Como vim basicamente pelo tetris não rolou.

author: {'steamid': '76561198210706908', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 4727, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2761, 'last_played': 1685786699}
review:
I've never played Puyo Puyo before, i must say it's quite funny and intriguing, even if it's not to easy to learn.
Of course all we know Tetris, the immortal videogame, i must say that the puzzles mash up has been a great idea. 
The Story mode is quite easy and funny, it allows to understand how to play. 
Also there are so many characters with different personalities and you can use one of them as your "avatar" for multiplayer mode.
The online multiplayer mode is very funny, intense and competitive, but the problem is the random Matchmaking system. If you're a newbie player like me you can  easily be matched against a top 100 ranking player by this system.

(The musics and the graphics are really cute and joyful) ♥

author: {'steamid': '76561198055976209', 'num_games_owned': 135, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 3470, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1182, 'last_played': 1688059953}
review:
I like playing Tetris so I got this for that, only played the Endurance mode thus far. 

Puyo is no good for me because I'm colour blind and don't really feel like learning to read the shapes (and the game itself doesn't interest me much). Story mode is not necessary to play at all to get all the characters, just use a cheat code (which is what I did, you can find it by searching online). 

This is modern Tetris with easy T-spins and lots of time to place the pieces, lots of fun little tricks to learn. Also it's mostly head to head. Even if you're playing single player, you'll be going against the CPU.

Has screaming anime characters for added entertainment factor. 

One annoying thing is that there's a delay spike when the game loads the next opponent in Endurance, be aware of that. There other is that there's a free browser implementation of tetris at tetr.io which has the same features as this minus the anime avatars.
