author: {'steamid': '76561198189205806', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 10412, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1572, 'last_played': 1606060200}
review:
It's a shame American gamers played little of Puyo Puyo. Other than Dr. Robotniks Mean Bean Machine, Kirby's Avalanche and Puyo Pop Fever. This feels like a slow introduction to a lesser known franchise to newcomers, by putting in Tetris along with Puyo Puyo, I think I worded it awkwardly. Since it has Tetris on the title and it is one of the few officially released PC Tetris releases I love playing Tetris and going nuts stacking them, the interest in Puyo Puyo grew.

The story mode doesn't take itself seriously and that is a good thing. Despite the darker series Puyo Puyo spun-off from, the jokes had me chuckle a bit and I didn't feel at all frustrated one bit. Oh and cuteness, everybody loves cute stuff.

Anyways, I haven't played online because I am still learning how to get better with chains and T-Spins.

review: El juego es muy entretenido. Tiene varios modos offline y online, tanto multijugador como solitario, local o por internet. Se puede jugar Tetris o Puyo Puyo por separado, e inclusive tiene modos que combinan ambos en la misma partida lo cual lo hace mucho mejor. El juego es excelente, le otorgo un 9/10. El punto que le falta para el 10 se lo saco por el hecho de que no está en español, solo inglés y japonés. Pero fuera de eso, no hay manera de arrepentirse de esta compra.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084283780', 'num_games_owned': 73, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 45820, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32545, 'last_played': 1709501403}
review:
Depois de mais de um ano do lançamento de Puyo Puyo Tetris, decidi finalmente escrever uma avaliação. Embora possa ser tarde, talvez interesse a alguns jogadores falantes de português que, por acaso, se deparem com isso.

[b]Puyo Puyo Tetris (para PC) é um jogo recomendado? Sim! Vamos aos porquês, separados em tópicos:[/b]

[h1]Familiariedade[/h1]
Após anos sem jogos novos para o ocidente, a SEGA decidiu investir novamente na internacionalização da série, dessa vez usando inteligentemente um título muito mais conhecido por aqui: Tetris. O resultado, como se pode imaginar, é um jogo que atraiu muitos fãs deste, e também os introduziu a Puyo Puyo. Pude conhecer algumas pessoas que demonstraram bastante interesse em melhorar suas habilidades em Puyo. Essa união de comunidades, de muitas formas, é positiva, pois aumenta a divulgação de ambos os jogos, expande o leque de possibilidades de partidas, incentiva streams e campeonatos que, de outra maneira, não existiriam.

[h1]Modo História[/h1]
Muito embora história nunca tenha sido um dos pontos [i]fortes[/i] de ambas as séries (há nada de muito épico), Puyo Puyo Tetris faz um trabalho excelente a esse respeito. Não apenas somos introduzidos a uma trama pitoresca, como também podemos observar o esforço da equipe de tradução e de atuação em adaptar tudo da forma mais fiel e intrigante possível para o inglês. Talvez o ponto mais forte da história seja o fato de ela mesma não se dar a seriedade que alguns poderiam esperar. No fim das contas, estamos falando de jogos onde seus objetivos são estourar gelatinas e apagar linhas de blocos... Talvez seja possível fazer algo sério com isso, mas qual é a vantagem imediata?
O roteiro é bastante simples, mas não tarda em fazer uma viagem total na maionese. Como de costume, as protagonistas da série Puyo Puyo acabam se encontrando pela enésima vez, pois, por algum motivo inicialmente misterioso, seus universos colidiram novamente. Além disso, somos introduzidos a personagens completamente novos, os tripulantes da Starship Tetra, uma espaçonave que também se depara com acontecimentos bizarros. Juntos, os novos amigos vão ao infinito e além, passando por inúmeros personagens (alguns dos quais só fazem breves aparições, pelo [i]fan service[/i]) e chegando cada vez mais ao clímax do conflito.
Admitidamente, a trama tem seus defeitos. Apesar de não se levar muito a sério, a história tem seus momentos mais emotivos, mas muitas vezes eles acabam caíndo por terra porque alguns personagens simplesmente não foram desenvolvidos ou tratados com seriedade o suficiente, o que pode tirar um pouco da sensação de dever cumprido ao completá-la.
Vale fazer menção especial aos três capítulos adicionais, que não têm relevância para a história principal. São historinhas breves focadas em certos personagens. A história de Schezo é absolutamente hilária e imperdível, brincando muito bem com o personagem e desenvolvendo-o perfeitamente.

[h1]Modos de Jogo[/h1]
É óbvio que os modos de jogo têm que ser a parte mais caprichada do jogo, e a entrega aqui é bastante satisfatória.
[b]Versus –[/b] É o modo mais simples de jogo. Pode-se jogar uma partida de Puyo contra Tetris, Puyo contra Puyo ou Tetris contra Tetris. Divertido, e também é o modo mais movimentado no online.
[b]Swap –[/b] Queridinho dos torneios, principalmente os estadunidenses. Nesse modo, é inicialmente sorteado se os jogadores têm que jogar Puyo ou Tetris. Depois de algum tempo, o jogo muda. O foco aqui é tentar fazer cadeias longas em Puyo e depois complementar com combos em Tetris (o que aumenta o poder do seu ataque), ou o contrário. Também é um incentivo muito legal para que os jogadores busquem melhorar suas habilidades tanto em Puyo quanto em Tetris.
[b]Party –[/b] Um modo mais casual, que funciona de maneira parecida com o Versus. A grande diferença reside no fato que estourar certos grupos de puyos ou limpar certa linha em Tetris dá bônus aos jogadores (pode-se ficar invulnerável por algum tempo, ter o poder do seu ataque aumentado ou deixar as peças do seu oponente esquisitas, por exemplo). De todos os modos, é o que menos ouço falar a respeito, o que é uma pena, pois me parece muito divertido.
[b]Fusion –[/b] O modo mais confuso do jogo, pois os jogadores têm que jogar Puyo e Tetris ao mesmo tempo. Ou seja, puyos e tetrominos ocupam o mesmo ecrã! É bastante infame, o que de certa forma entendo. Também parece ter mais lag que o normal, mesmo em partidas de um contra um.
[b]Big Bang –[/b] O último dos modos. Os jogadores são apresentados a telas pré-montadas, cheias de puyos e tetrominos, e precisam fazer as cadeias e combos o mais depressa possível. Após determinado intervalo, o jogador que tiver tido o melhor desempenho envia um pouco de dano ao adversário, que acaba reduzindo uma parcela de sua barra de vida. Tem uma apresentação visual muito interessante e seus efeitos são bastante divertidos. Para quem procura competição, no entanto, esse modo é de longe o mais fraco, e enjoa rapidamente.
Ou seja, modos de jogo não faltam. Foi feito um excelente trabalho referente a isso.

[h1]Apresentação[/h1]
Além dos vários modos de jogo, temos ainda diversos cenários diferentes enfeitando as partidas, e a trilha sonora não deixa a desejar. Ainda assim, o jogo começa com só uma parcela desse detalhamento: para deixar tudo mais bonito e variado, é necessário desbloquear os conteúdos adicionais completando capítulos do modo história. É uma tentativa positiva e atraente de fazer com que os jogadores adentrem o universo do jogo um pouco mais.
O jogo conta com 24 personagens jogáveis, 8 dos quais desbloqueáveis também pelo modo história. Cada personagem tem suas próprias falas e representações visuais, o que renova ainda mais a experiência de jogatina.

[h1]Desafios[/h1]
Existem, no jogo, alguns desafios que podem ser completados tanto para Puyo como para Tetris. Embora não tenham o mesmo foco competitivo que os outros modos, eles dão um retoque único à jogatina. As conquistas Steam partem de um grau fácil a moderado de dificuldade, e também incentivam a busca por aprimoramento e completude.

[h1]Batalhas contra a CPU[/h1]
Essa é a parte da qual realmente não posso falar muito, já que nunca entrei a fundo na questão, mas o jogo conta com CPUs de níveis variados e com estratégias diferentes. Para jogadores de nível alto, não existe muita graça em batalhar contra a inteligência artificial, mas para quem deseja treinar e se acostumar com os modos de jogo, as CPUs são muito bem-vindas. Além disso, existe um modo Endurance, onde devemos enfrentar os personagens do jogo até perdermos uma partida, o que pode ser divertido para passar o tempo.

[h1]Puzzle League e Free Play[/h1]
Por último, mas não menos importante, não podemos deixar de falar dos modos online principais. Na Puzzle League, jogadores de todo o mundo competem em todos os modos de jogo (embora exista uma opção para desabilitar certos modos) em busca de rating (pontuação), rank (título) e league (nível). No Free Play, é possível organizar salas de até quatro pessoas e convidar amigos para jogar.

[h1]Nada é perfeito...[/h1]
Embora bem trabalhado, o jogo ainda tem pecados incômodos (embora, com o tempo, seja possível ignorar alguns deles). Problemas notáveis incluem:
– Erros no sistema de partidas da Puzzle League, com jogadores fantasmas aparecendo;
– Falta de um sistema que tire jogadores inativos do sistema de partidas da Puzzle League;
– Existem formas de se desconectar de uma partida na Puzzle League, dando pontos indevidos a ambos os jogadores;
– Trapaceiros dominam o topo do ranking da Puzzle League, e não há nada a se fazer a respeito, aparentemente;
– Oponentes recentes não aparecem na lista da Steam, o que pode complicar o contato.

E é basicamente isso. Os erros negativam pouco a qualidade do jogo. Por todos os pontos positivos apresentado, minha resposta não poderia ser senão sim, vale a pena comprar Puyo Puyo Tetris.

author: {'steamid': '76561198102063164', 'num_games_owned': 556, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 1720, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 253, 'last_played': 1655051983}
review:
I am torn. I've wanted Puyo Puyo Tetris for an insanely long time, mainly because I just wanted a way to play Tetris on Steam and this was the only game on Steam that's available to fulfill that need. That's the main reason I've wanted this. Puyo Puyo be damned. But with this...you're getting two games in one. I guess that's the whole point with what the game's called.

But why am I torn? I wanna mention a few things. The production values for something like this are fantastic. I can easily see now why the game costs as much as it does. There is a full blown adventure mode serving to present a little story mode with a whole cast of characters. I'm not all too familiar with them though, seeing as this is my first entry in the Puyo Puyo franchise(?), but the story is lighthearted and doesn't seek to accomplish much aside from having a reason to combine Puyo Puyo and Tetris into one game. I love the art style and the voice acting. The campaign itself for me ranges from "wow this is really easy" to "oh god I have no idea what I'm doing please help". But that's not a bad thing - people familiar with one game have a good platform to learn and understand a new game in a very casual environment, as the AI often enough isn't too hard on you and treats you as a newbie for a good majority of it. Some may see it as needless handholding, I see it as not overwhelming people who might not be familiar with one or the other (or both).

I also enjoy the fun & quirky game modes, Big Bang was an absolute blast to play and going on a massive win streak there against the AI is super satisfying. And the accessibility for new players is great, Puyo Puyo or Tetris - the game does a great job at introducing players to the core mechanics of each. My only gripe with this though is how there are no maps or tutorials to specifically practice certain techniques. For example, I want to learn how to T-Spin but I find it really difficult to manage setting up T-Spin combos and just end up making a bigger problem than necessary. Some practice maps where everything is already set-up for T-Spinning would've been amazing and would've definitely helped ease myself into the mechanics of the game, specifically timing. The closest the game gets to that is a few challenges during Big Bang if you choose Tetris, but you're never given enough time to complete them before it begins tallying up the results and decides the victor of that wave.

Now here's the thing I don't particularly enjoy - the online mode. I've heard of the numerous connection problems people point out but I always thought to myself that it can't be that bad, but sure enough - t's bad. There were multiple occasions when I was playing against someone and the game just freezes with a connection error. A win is added to my profile and I gain a bunch of ranks. It doesn't feel like I've won anything. That, coupled with the fact matchmaking does NOT take into account people's skill levels means you are going to have a VERY miserable time playing online-versus mode. Seriously, as a very low-skill, low-tier Tetris player, I can't last even 10 seconds with some of these people, leading me to get frustrated and leave. Online is not at all newbie friendly, as every person in the online mode will do anything and everything to win. I tried telling them to "go easy on me" but people always ignore those greetings messages. I tried seeing if there were any newbie free-play lobbies for me to have a more comfortable online experience, but it seems like the only thing anyone ever plays is the matchmaking, so online is a complete no-go if you are at all a low-level Tetris player. Don't even bother if you don't know the ins and outs of either Puyo Puyo or Tetris, you will quite literally get absolutely demolished.

Do I recommend this? If you're only interested in an online Tetris or Puyo Puyo, no. Jstris is a better & free alternative in your browser, so play that if you want Tetris with multiplayer (or go play Tetris 99 on the Switch). As for Puyo Puyo multiplayer, I can't give you any pointers seeing as this is my first Puyo Puyo, Mean Bean Machine not withstanding. If you want a Tetris game on Steam - sure. If you want a Puyo Puyo & Tetris combo game with a story mode that incorporates both while introducing unique twists - yes.

I don't regret my purchase but I only see this game as a single player only game unfortunately. I wish the online community was a little more easy-going towards newer players.

author: {'steamid': '76561198346279014', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 15887, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11654, 'last_played': 1669111042}
review:
ぷよらーですが、２：８くらいの割合でテトラーとマッチングします。
相変わらずマッチング相手のレートは下から上までバラバラですが、入り直すことで相手を選べる仕様なので問題ないです。
流石に平日昼間とかだと過疎ってますが、夜間・深夜はそこそこ人がいます。

詳細は不明ですがごくまれに勝利・敗北確定後に対戦終了画面に移行せず、
操作が効かなくなりゲームを強制終了するしかなくなる、というバグ（？）が起こります。
（ネット対戦中にゲームを強制終了すると切断扱いとなり、理不尽にレートが下がります）
また、低レート帯でもなかなか強いので、ぷよぷよもテトリスも未経験の方にはおすすめできません。
switch版の基準で言うならレート8000台並みの実力があったほうがいいです。

最後に、PCゲーということもありキャラ画像やボイス等の差し替えが可能です。
勿論それなりの知識が必要ですが、この一点だけでも買う価値はあると思います。
私は中途半端にボイスだけ変えて諦めました。

author: {'steamid': '76561198076869048', 'num_games_owned': 284, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 947, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 947, 'last_played': 1568332895}
review:
J'ai voulu découvrir PuyoPuyo, un versus unique qui sort de l'ordinaire. Super ! Let's go !
Mais j'ai vite déchanté face à la pire mécanique du jeu (et surement la pire mécanique du monde): Les Déchets.

[u]Description:[/u]
Des puyos gris (déchets) apparaissent sur le tableau adverse de façon aléatoire une fois que vous exécutez un combo d'au moins 2 hits.

[u]Problème:[/u]
Plus le combo de votre adversaire est gros, plus vous recevez de puyo gris, donc plus ça recouvre votre combo en préparation (qui devient donc bloqué/inutile), donc moins vous avez de place pour un nouveau combo, donc votre adversaire peut tranquillement vous abattre au sol avec des petits combos de chiasses. LE FUN !

[u]Solution[/u] (la seule et unique):
Faire un gros combo avant votre adversaire ... et c'est tout.

C'est simple, impossible de s'amuser ET de tryhard, c'est soit l'un soit l'autre.
Quand tu débute, y'a zéro mindgame, zéro mécanique de comeback, zéro chance de rattraper une erreur, zéro risque, zéro envie d'apprendre. Bref, ça s'adresse aux autistes ou aux suceurs de japs (ps: je ne m'exclue pas de ces derniers).

Précision, je n'ai heureusement pas jouer contre des gens en ligne, seulement contre un ami qui a 50h.

review: I'm going to support this game, but it's a rather painful support because the online matchmaking in this game is beyond jacked. 99% of the time I get paired to players with five times my level of skill. The story is great, I love the voice acting as well and the character design is the same as in Puyo Pop Fever, the cutesy look of which I dig but I can see why others wouldn't. Plenty of single player options as well, but ack the online leaves a really bad taste in my mouth.

review:
게임 설명
뿌요뿌요와 테트리스의 크로스오버 작품입니다.
기본적으로 대전 퍼즐 게임입니다.
자신이 퍼즐을 '더 어려운' 방법으로 맞출수록 상대방에게 방해물이 더 많이 쌓입니다.
가장 위까지 미노나 뿌요가 쌓여서 더 이상 미노나 뿌요를 올릴 수 없다면 패배합니다.
리뷰
혼자서 하기에는 참 좋은 게임인데, 퍼즐리그를 돌리는 순간부터 망겜이 됩니다.
친구끼리 하기 좋습니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079738529', 'num_games_owned': 283, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 3518, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1863, 'last_played': 1641969366}
review:
I'm not very good at this game but it's a hoot. 

This game is practically what it says on the tin; this game is a crazy mish-mash of both puzzle games. Puyo-Puyo is about getting 4 or more Puyos of the same color to touch each other, and and you use gravity to your advantage to link really cool combos. Tetris is, well, Tetris. Everyone knows what that's like. lol When you combine both, it becomes super intense and fun. But, it's a competitive game where you must go head-to-head with your opponent(s) to see who can come out on top after sending loads of garbage blocks/Puyos their way from combos. You can choose either to play Tetris or Puyo Puyo, depending on your preferences.

It comes with a couple of different modes too, like a challenge mode, a fusion mode that combines both Tetris and Puyo into one weird new game mode, and it even has a whole adventure mode. (Of which I've not played too much of, but I think gameplay-wise it's practically the same as multiplayer.)

Trust me, it's very much a good time. If you like the sound of anything I said, then pick this up. You won't regret it. :P

9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198287757347', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 10453, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2068, 'last_played': 1629693969}

(I myself prefer Puyo Puyo over tetris)

author: {'steamid': '76561197960677714', 'num_games_owned': 2155, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 883, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 288, 'last_played': 1597700176}
review:
Puyo Puyo Tetris ist (leider) das einzige Game auf Steam mit dem man Tetris zocken kann.
Es ist zwar relativ teuer meiner Meinung nach aber für Tetrisfans ein absolutes muss.
Am besten zuschlagen wenn es mal im Sale ist.
Ich habe es zwei mal. Einmal auf der Switch und da ich dort schon so begeistert war wollte ich es auch für den PC.
Das spricht schon Bände wie sehr mich das Game berührt.
Außerdem ist es ja ein 2 in 1 wenn man so möchte obwohl Puyo Puyo ein Game ist welches in westlichen Ländern eher unbekannt ist und stark an Dr.Mario erinnert. Mir persönlich gefällt Tetris besser aber ein wenig Abwechslung ist natürlich für den Preis nicht abzuerkennen.
Alles in allem habt ihr wenn es um das original Tetris geht keine großartig andere Wahl auf Steam.
Das einzige spielerische Negative finde ich, dass beim Tetris Marathon (quasi die Standard Tetris Version) das Spielfeld das erste Drittel des Bildschirms einnimmt und die Scoreanzeige dann den Rest.
Je nachdem wie groß der Bildschirm ist oder wie weit man davon weg sitzt könnte ich mir vorstellen, dass es schlecht erkennbar ist. Auf der Switch im portablen Modus ist es schon anstrengend für die Augen gewesen also vermute ich, dass am PC mit gewissen Setups das auch vorkommen kann.
Hier hätte man besser wie bei 99 Tetris den Mittleren Bildschirm voll ausnutzen können denn beim Zocken interessiert mich das Spielfeld mehr als die Scoreanzeige.
Sonst gibt es aber spielerisch nichts mehr auszusetzen! 
Alles in allem ein würdiger PC Titel der das OldSchool-Game bestens wiedergibt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198427484684', 'num_games_owned': 104, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 23938, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16513, 'last_played': 1615088091}
review:
[h1] [b] [u] Puyo Puyo Tetris [/u] [/b] [/h1]

Puyo Puyo Tetris es un juego que se agradece de haberse hecho, debido a que combina 2 sagas famosas (Occidente y Oriente)
A pesar que hoy en día no lo juega mucha gente como para encontrar a tu nivel en la liga sigue siendo bueno
El juego tiene un modo local bastante amplio por lo que te entretendrás bastante

[b] [u] Pros [/u] [/b]
[list]
[*] Modo aventura (recomiendo completarlo antes de ir al Online) (Liga)
[*] 24 personajes a elegir, incluyendo voces alternas
[*] Modo Tutorial para aprender a jugar, no es del todo profundo, pero si lo suficiente
[*] Puedes variar las voces entre el Ingles y el Japones
[*] Varios modos de juego tanto local como Online, incluyendo una Liga
[*] Capacidad para jugar hasta 4 personas tanto local como Online
[/list]
[b] [u] Contras [/u] [/b]
[list]
[*] Jugar de a 3-4 jugadores suele ser muy incomodo si no es Puyo (Aún peor en Swap)
[*] Lo que dicen los personajes durante los Combos/Chains no se sobrepone al anterior si este no lo termina de decir, causando así Combos o Chains sin voz
[*] El Ranked está roto, puedes encontrar gente de cualquier nivel
[/List]
[h1] [b] Conclusión [/b] [/h1]

Si lo que buscas es entrarte al mundo del Tetris o del Puyo o una combinación de ambos 
mediante un Crossover. este juego es para ti

테트리스 정말 재미있습니다. 심심할때 집중하면 꿀잼 추천합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561197986029918', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 8171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7718, 'last_played': 1613959100}
review:
A great introduction to players who aren't familiar with the [b][i]Puyo Puyo[/i][/b] series.  The story mode aspect works well with the two puzzle dimensions being merged into one, and the new cast of characters that reign from the [b][i]Tetris[/i][/b] dimension[spoiler]all of which are named after a [i]Tetrimino[/i] piece (-1 character)[/spoiler]fit within [b][i]Puyo Puyo[/i][/b].  I say this loosely, but it's definitely one of the more invested and thought-out plots within the series, all while keeping its charming and comedic values.

Aside from all that, it makes for a great party game with friends and for all ages.  The variety of modes keeps the game feeling fresh and entertaining, and having the option to play [b][i]Puyo Puyo[/i][/b] and/or [b][i]Tetris[/i][/b] is what makes this a must for puzzle enthusiasts.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105504622', 'num_games_owned': 493, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 174, 'last_played': 1573957252}
review:
Well it's Puyo mode with Tetris mixed in.
Over all this game is okay, I do wish they added more modes to play around with.
Online works fine and doesn't seem to lag regardless where the person is from.
Do note that if you do Puyo vs Tetris, the Tetris player does have the upper hand in terms of attack balancing.

Mostly Tetris players play this game now just as an heads up since there's a new Puyo game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087835461', 'num_games_owned': 479, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 4749, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2034, 'last_played': 1693887092}
review:
I've played a lot of Tetris. I'm no expert, and the players in online make me feel like a beginner, but this is an unmissable classic if you love Tetris *or* Puyo, and I'm actually able to Puyo because of this game forcing you to in the story progression.

Not that I mind, since learning to Puyo helped me better focus on planning for future pieces in Tetris...

Beware the DT Cannon, though...!

review:
It's Puyo Puyo and it's Tetris all under one neat competitive bow!\
It's hard to mess up Puyo Puyo and Tetris, but to flesh out a multiplayer involving both games, multiple game modes, and a campaign goes above and beyond what any of these games was designed to offer.
There is nothing quite like it; I'm glad it was done right the first time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198107367737', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3010, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1914, 'last_played': 1611817151}
review:
I have a love hate relationship with puyopuyo tetris. I absolutely love playing tetris and I hate playing puyopuyo. Despite this, the game is still amazing because I refuse to let my incapability to learn how to stack puyo's to determine how good I think this game is. Now if you don't mind, i'm going to go screw myself by placing a tetris piece 1 space away from where I need it.

in seriousness, the multiplayer function is incredibly lacking because it seemed that when I tried to play with my friend, it kept disconnecting the game halfway through almost every single time. Despite this, the rest of the game is great. adventure is very entertaining, I love all the different gamemodes, and the voice acting is fun to hear when you get combos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051939071', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 9756, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9306, 'last_played': 1577839397}
review: Puyo Puyo Tetris is the perfect gateway into the Puyo Puyo franchise, this game boasts quite a large amount of content (multiple game modes, a story, and multiple score attack modes) and it is definitely worth the price. It should be mentioned for sure that this port of the game has very well documented issues, a better port would be most other versions of this game (i.e. Switch, PS3/4, etc.). However, personally, I have never had an issue with an in game glitch or soft lock, as they are relatively rare and/or easy to avoid. Overall, Puyo Puyo Tetris is a very fun game, and I wholeheartedly recommend this game to any gamer, casual or hardcore.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010179510', 'num_games_owned': 1779, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 423, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 331, 'last_played': 1589773232}
review: The video game equivalent of chocolate and peanut butter. Puyo Puyo Tetris blends, well, Puyo Puyo and Tetris to great effect. There are various modes that mix the two to varying degrees, from swapping between the two styles to straight dropping both Puyos and tetrominoes onto the same board. The story mode weaves a story with the Puyo Puyo and an original Tetris set of characters interacting with each other. It doesn't rise above Saturday morning cartoon level fare, but they do a good job of mixing things up, and you can tell the writers and VAs had fun with it. In all, if you're a fan of Puyo Puyo, Tetris, or both, this is worth a look.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014161807', 'num_games_owned': 529, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 985, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 985, 'last_played': 1561092434}
review:
Solid, competitive, and fun puzzle game with the option of either Puyo Puyo or Tetris, two, very popular puzzle games, particularly in Japan. There are also other modes available such as a combination of both Puyo Puyo and Tetris, a mode only available in this title. 

An emphasis on competitive in that it isn't just about stacking quickly and unleashing chains, combos, and T-spins, but you will also want to watch your opponent to see when they will unleash an attack, and be able to react to them, or when they are vulnerable to attacks that will stop them from being able to attack. Understanding the flow of offensive play and defensive play will be key. 

You can still play competitively with knowledge in only one game mode if you wish. Find your preferred play style and clear stacks of puyo/lines to victory!

author: {'steamid': '76561198149890402', 'num_games_owned': 419, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1394, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1265, 'last_played': 1708671952}
review:
I was first introduced to puyo when i was around 7 years of age and was introduced to puyo pop fever, in which i had never had much of an experience with tetris. this game intorduces me to tetris, and i am realising by playing this game exactly how great both of these games were. Absolutely nailed it with this game, which can allow you experience puyo or tetris, or even allow you to combine both together, which is actually really awesome. Absolute trip down memory lane, and brings me soo much joy. would recommend to anyone, for an awesome experience and just a ton of fun overall 

8.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198139466009', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 151, 'playtime_forever': 1015, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 463, 'last_played': 1579465166}
review: Un super jeu. L'association des deux styles de gameplay entre Puyo Puyo et Tetris apporte un vent de fraîcheur étonnant et appréciable. Cependant le multijoueur en ligne est particulièrement écœurant. En face de vous il n'y aura que des joueurs à la recherche d'une performance égocentrique : oubliez toute forme de plaisir de jeu, ici c'est celui qui a la plus grosse qui l'emporte. Autant dire que si vous êtes comme moi et que vous aimez prendre le temps d'apprécier les choses, vous n'avez pas votre place dans le classement.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120778888', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 912, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 769, 'last_played': 1590334882}
review:
Puyo Puyo Tetris Ist eine Mischung aus Puyo Puyo und Tetris, dass ich eine Warnung ausspreche:
Solltet ihr nur für Tetris hier sein gibt es bessere und kostenlose Alternativen.

Wenn euch diese Warnung nicht aufhält erwartet euch eine kurzweilige Mischung aus Player Vs. CPU Spielen die von den Klassischen Versionen von Tetris und Puyo Puyo bis zur kompletten Vermischung der beiden Spiele mit eigenen Regeln reichen.

Der Online-PvP-Bereich ist mit wenigen, aber starken Gegnern gespickt, Man sollte sich mit seinen Fertigkeiten sicher sein, bevor man hier spielt. Zum glück kann man aber in den Optionen Spiele im PvP bereich bannen, sodass du nur deine lieblings-Spieltypen dort spielen kannst.

Die Story besitzt ebenso wie seine Charaktere einen kindlichen Humor, der mir persönlich Spaß gemacht hat, aber auch für manche zu flach und eindimensional sein kann.

Jedoch wird, sobald man alle Spielmodi im Player Vs. NPC kennt und beherrscht, der Spielspaß schnell sinken. In meinen 12 Spielstunden hatte ich das Gefühl, alles gesehen und gemacht zu haben, was das Spiel anzubieten hat.
Außerdem stellt der PvP-Bereich einen enormen Sprung in der Schwierigkeit dar, dass man sich nach ein paar Versuchen wahrscheinlich komplett davon fernhält. 

Daher kann ich das Spiel nur bei Rabattaktionen um 50% empfehlen, da die kurze Zeit die ich mit dem spiel Spaß hatte, ich wirklich viel Spaß hatte.

author: {'steamid': '76561198167467582', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 12721, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5927, 'last_played': 1661414325}
review:
I can recommend this game to anyone who loves either Puyo Puyo, Tetris, or both. I will warn you, though, that there are a few issues regarding balances in this game, specifically in relation to garbage.

Garbage appears in Tetris boards as single lines, making each individual piece of garbage more daunting. The more garbage, the more lines, et cetera. The garbage pushes your board upwards from the bottom, letting you make combos.

On the other hand,

Puyo Puyo players are, when put against Tetris players, not going to have as much fun. Garbage comes from the top, and even single units can mess you up. But that's just Puyo Puyo, so it's to be expected. The fun is taken away with how fast a tetris player can deal damage through combos, Tetrises or T-spins, while a Puyo Puyo player is waiting for garbage to fall. When the garbage finally finishes descending, you can place one to two puyo pairs before the next set of garbage falls, if the Tetris player is good enough.

Don't worry, though; this doesn't mean Puyo Puyo vs Tetris isn't fun. Sometimes, they have the longest games, and they can be quite interesting! Two puzzles collide into one decently executed amalgamation. This game is also a lot of fun with friends that play with you, so always consider that as an option!

author: {'steamid': '76561198011839414', 'num_games_owned': 1788, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 2108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1895, 'last_played': 1607360759}
review:
Sometimes throwing different games or game types together can bring some interesting results. Puyo Puyo Tetris is a lot more than interesting though. It's arguably one of the best competitive Tetris games out there, and the Puyo Puyo side of things adds for an interesting challenge especially if you play against someone who is only familiar with one of them. A story mode with a variety of tasks and challenges, along with an Arcade mode where you can play all the various modes against the AI or just marathon them alone; makes for rich set of features.

It's not perfect though. The PC port suffers from weird stutters and slowdowns, mostly during transitions between AI players in Endurance mode and during some visual effects. It rarely ever becomes a serious problem though. Additionally, it has Denuvo, but SEGA might remove that at some point.

This game is great and you should play it if you like Tetris or Puyo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198092379263', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 15600, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10076, 'last_played': 1680801133}
review:
Pros:
- It's Tetris
- Literally only official tetris game on PC now

Cons:
- Matchmaking system completely broken (doesn't even take ranking into consideration in this broken PC port)
- Servers are god awful, game lags all over the place making tetris unplayable at times
- Matches with puyo puyo are unbalanced for low to mid range players and is equivalent of playing against a 4 wider (the outcome is out of your control = not fun)
- Position of hold box and next piece queue in 4p mode is absolute cancer and somebody should be fired. Seriously, why?

Despite all best efforts by sega to both botch this port from console and screw up every online component imaginable, it's still tetris so i still have to give it a positive review...

author: {'steamid': '76561198119514522', 'num_games_owned': 301, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 61269, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59542, 'last_played': 1616523600}
review:
Great game, but broken matchmaking, especially due to its unpopularity.
If you dont mind that then its a great SP experience or one with friends.

author: {'steamid': '76561198195272059', 'num_games_owned': 105, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 4877, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2081, 'last_played': 1694891282}
review:
En mi infancia, por allá en 2012 cuando tenía 9 años, recibí mi primer portátil; una NDS. Había un gran catálogo de juegos por haber los cuales incluía dicha consola, pero entre ellos, uno de los que más llamó mi atención, fue "Puyo Puyo Fever". Como toda buena impresión, desconocía en su totalidad de qué impartía el juego, pero una vez que lo probé, no había marcha atrás. Gradualmente, se convirtió en mi juego favorito de dicha consola, en ocasiones, desvelándome con dicho.

El tiempo pasó, y a la larga, terminé abandonando la consola, por ende, el mismo juego.

Años después, en 2018, me enteré de la existencia de este juego. Estaba emocionado al ver que uno de mis juegos de la infancia había vuelto, y mejor aún, en Steam, donde ahora poseo varios juegos que en ocasiones me apetecen jugar.

Ingresando al punto... ¿qué voy a decir de este juego? Es grandioso, es fantástico, es disfrutable y mucho más. La variedad de personajes, soundtracks, opciones, y, sobretodo, el poder escoger entre Tetris y Puyo hacen que este juego sea una osadía de diversión que puede ser disfrutado por cualquier persona. No es difícil de entender, es sencillo, e inclusive explicándote de manera dinámica varias de las mecánicas del juego, algunas implementadas en el mismo.

Para mi gusto, este juego es un regalo para mí, pues simplemente no encuentro el aburrimiento en dicho, por más veces que pierda o gane, no encuentro manera de que me pueda aburrir.

Si lo que quieres es relajarte un poco, pero a la vez, divertirte sin igual, bienvenido seas, este es tu juego.

author: {'steamid': '76561198826800109', 'num_games_owned': 92, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 1095, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 195, 'last_played': 1691582602}
review:
This game is really fun honestly. I have the PS4 version of it but i do think this version is better because of mods, free online play, Japanese voice options, etc etc. The only thing i don't really like is the keyboard/mouse controls, but that's okay because i can plug in my PS4 controller and play like that.
The story of this game is absolutely hilarious. It's classic SEGA game style, starts off cutesy with a large issue but is still cute and fun, sticks in loads of jokes in the middle, gets more serious, eventually gets kind of dark, but ends up wrapping up happy with everything fine (although, me and my friends almost cried watching the last few cutscenes!). A lot of people complain about the voice acting (mostly Lemres because his voice doesn't really fit) but i think most of it (the only voice i didn't really like was Xander Mobus as Satan, aka Dark Prince in the English version, i'd def change that.) fits.
This game can supply hours of play. If you're willing to dish out some money i suggest it. It's one of the best games i've ever played and introduced me to an awesome franchise.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991157647', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 117, 'playtime_forever': 1343, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 12, 'playtime_at_review': 218, 'last_played': 1712292727}
review:
Damn this game is fun! It's got a fantastic arcade style feel to it with the Tetris and Puyo games going together side by side. Mix with each other at times and hell there's so many different game modes that mix everything up.

The online ranked matches is going strong and it's competitive with some good players. If you are the type who wants to take these games seriously and compete against other players, check this out now rather than later.

The adventure mode story is absolutely fantastic. Great voice acting really captures the comedy and silliness of it all. Schezo... lol. I literally can jump into the story mode of this game depressed and find it impossible to stay unhappy. Everything is just so fun and the characters are so entertaining. The artwork is incredibly cute too.

I don't really know what the complaints are people are talking about, I don't care to read them either. I really love this game, a lot. And the BEST thing is IMO, is it's designed to be so incredibly flexible and supportive of people who don't have a lot of time to play a game or people who just want to play it for 10-15 minutes and then stop.

author: {'steamid': '76561198171557518', 'num_games_owned': 1315, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 1669, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 323, 'last_played': 1616842803}
review:
5小时10章100关全三星，应该是极限了。Puyo puyo是很难计算的，难度比俄罗斯方块大得多，俄罗斯方块更看经验，T-Spin的形状是有固定搭配的，而Puyo puyo需要在短时间内精确计算，若不应放置的颜色放置错了，就会断Combo，而Combo是Puyo Puyo的命根子，不像俄罗斯方块的Back To Back断了还能马上接上，这样只损失一行攻击。

进阶玩家应该尝试过俄罗斯方块的“DT砲”、Puyo puyo的“GTR開局”等定式，从而击败不少新手玩家，但是这只是游戏的开始，这类游戏的断层非常严重，高手非常多，99%的玩家基本都会在瓶颈处遭遇劝退的威胁。

author: {'steamid': '76561198017165443', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 421, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1631011825}
review:
I love Puyo Puyo and tetris but the multiplayer is UNPLAYABLE.

I can't play with friends who have the slightest lag. 
Around 80ms ping and you will get constant black screens and disconnection.

Fun game by itself but multiplayer was unplayable for me and my friends.

review:
저는 사람들이 테트리스를 하는 것만 보고 직접 해보진 않았는데 이 게임을 통해서 처음으로 테트리스를 직접 해볼 수 있어서 좋았습니다. 
그리고 오리지널 테트리스만 있는 것이 아닌 뿌요뿌요 버전의 테트리스도 있고 해볼 수 있어서 좋았습니다. 
해보니까 정말 재미있습니다. 
그리고 게임이 정말로 아기장장해서 웃음이 나오기도 했습니다. 
근데 역시 테트리스를 처음 해본자로서 너무 어렵네요 ㅜ

author: {'steamid': '76561198153957973', 'num_games_owned': 280, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 2903, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2898, 'last_played': 1569364004}
review:
God tier gaming done in its simplest form. This game is a prime example that saya "hold my beer" to people that say its all about the graphics

I'd buy it again if I could but I own all the copies for each platform I own. This game got me through a lot in high school and I know that's strange to hear coming from a puzzle game but this really did help me through some rough times

Please give this game your money, SEGA has done a great job of introducing its Puyo game alongside a more commonly known puzzler. Tutorials for puyo are lackluster but you can still have a great time with the tetris aspect of things

author: {'steamid': '76561198272316226', 'num_games_owned': 61, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 19, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1559692238}
review:
I wanted to buy this game at first mainly because of tetris and because there wasn't any other tetris option in steam. I was convinced to buying it because you could play online.

However, this game is a combination of both tetris and puyopuyo,but it feels like it is more puyopuyo centered. Also, the way the game is designed is uncomfortably cringey and childish for my taste.

As a tetris fan and lover, I strongly DON'T recommend to buy this game because you feel like you are playing something else. Better options for you are to download for free a software called NullpoMino (includes online games), and just using an emulator to play the tetris 1989 NES version... you'll have more fun with that. Don't waste your money on this and instead let's wait for the tetris 99 to arrive to steam.

P.S: I got my refund luckily

review:
Firstly, R.I.P. Tetris Friends

Secondly, Because of the rise of Tetris 99 there is a subsequent decline in players for Puyo Puyo Tetris (In terms of Tetris players); Puyo players on the other hand have all transfered to "Puyo Puyo Champions". So yeah less players.

Finally, because of the players leaving now you will rarely be matched up with a player your skill level.

R.I.P. Tetris Friends

author: {'steamid': '76561198144862591', 'num_games_owned': 89, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 28983, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1914, 'last_played': 1679935725}
review:
什么傻逼移植？？
闪退，未响应，弱智匹配，你还能多弱智？我还真不奇怪PPT2能更差，你SEGA真是活该走到今天这样
更改的原因只有一个，它的联机体验极其，极其脑瘫
我对它排名10000+排到411这种局意见都不大，但一旦，匹配时你先进入到房间再匹配到对手就会引起游戏崩溃
我是不知道这么简单的问题这么久都没一点反应是什么原因，反正这差评我给了
有NS或者PS4的完全不推荐入手，联机体验太差了

author: {'steamid': '76561198295050833', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 6921, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5055, 'last_played': 1658598716}
review:
처음 시작할 때에는 ai도 버겁고 할 수 있는 것이라고는 테트리스! 뿐이지만 30시간 정도를 하니 어느정도의 빌드와 티스핀을 할 수가 있고 50시간을 하면 빌드 이외에서 티스핀을 넣을 수가 있으며 80시간을 하면 그나마 티스핀을 자연스럽게 넣을 수가 있게되며 이때부터 본인이 점점 청정수가 아님을 인지하게 됩니다. 간단하게 10시간정도만 할 줄 알았으나 뭔가 모르게 끌리는 매력이 숨어있는 게임입니다. (100시간을 해도 고인물한테 뚜까맞고 청정수가 아니라고해도 먼지가 살짝 들어간 수준이니.. 언제쯤 난 고인물이 될까?)

ㅅㅈㅎㅈ ㅈㄴㅈㅇ

review:

please play this game. it is worth every cent

review:
一个又贵又难没有中文连里面的电脑都比我厉害的游戏

author: {'steamid': '76561198068294123', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 371, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 102, 'last_played': 1680638027}
review:
Puyo Puyo Tetris was a purchase I always wanted to make and now did and it was worth every cent

the theme/style of the game is very happy there are i think it was 12 pieces of music where 11 are unique (to me atleast) and 1 is a renditio of the tetris theme . you can chang some visual styles  like for example the tetris blocks  and so on from the start but you unlock credits by playing to get even more costumazation 

puyo puyo tetris offers a vast range of game-modes for offline and online play. You will be entertained for a long time and you can always play a new mode of you want to change things up. what was new to me is that there are charachters, while first confused and worrying they are only visual and aduiable so you see someone and hear them say things when you clear rows ,start,loose, etc

which is nice and gives the tetris "universe" some more charachter to it. 

I highly recommend buying it, im sure that under one game-mode  there is something for everyone and its a really fun game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077373669', 'num_games_owned': 179, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 2475, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1235, 'last_played': 1663930541}
review: If you want to find a modern Puyo/Tetris game with its own story, this game would be a good choice.

author: {'steamid': '76561198381549401', 'num_games_owned': 1095, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 769, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 481, 'last_played': 1626194020}
review: A great blend of two classic puzzle game series'. There is a ton of customisation options and lots of different game modes. This game (along with Tetris 99 on the Switch) managed to get me hooked on Tetris which I was never interested in growing up. The music is good and the script is surprisingly quite funny and I was able to follow the story and characters pretty well despite being a sequel in a series of games that have mostly not been released outside of Japan. I've heard that a lot of people prefer the Japanese character voices but I don't think the English VA's do a half-bad job. Overall, this game is a must buy for fans of either franchise or those who are new to puzzle games (like I was).

author: {'steamid': '76561198207423467', 'num_games_owned': 67, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 49821, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37826, 'last_played': 1710797202}
review:
Puyo Puyo Tetris é um jogo bom pra jogar com os amigos. Além de ambos os modos serem desbalanceados, Big Bang, Fusion e Party são basicamente ignorados, dando foco ao Swap e Versus. O online do jogo não é um de seus pontos mais fortes, já que qualquer um pode abrir a Cheat Engine e editar seu Rating na Puzzle League. Nas partidas onlines, a menor instabilidade de conexão pode afetar toda a partida. O jogo também inclui vários bugs, como o softlock depois de uma partida, que pode ser resolvido ao tirar e colocar novamente o cabo ethernet. PPT parece que foi abandonado pela Sega, que está dando mais foco ao eSports/Champions.

O que fazer no PPT:
Jogar o Story Mode
Experimentar Puyo/Tetris
Evitar Fusion e Party, por enquanto
Desbloquear todos os itens, incluindo os compráveis e que podem ser desbloqueados no Story Mode
Jogar com um, dois ou três amigos
Evitar Puzzle League até você virar um deus do(s) Puzzle(s)

Esse jogo... tá ok. Só não gaste mais de 600 horas com ele. >:]

author: {'steamid': '76561198043883639', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 710, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1639591817}
review: I love this game a lot. Puyo Puyo is such a cute puzzle game and seeing it crossover with Tetris is rather strange, yet very unique. It is a really fun game to play. This game is also out on PS4 and Nintendo Switch, but to be honest, I prefer the Steam version instead. I played Puyo Puyo for the Gameboy Advance, as well as Puyo Puyo Chronicles for the 3DS. Not only were the games cute and beautiful, but they were also fun to both look at and play. The Puyo Puyo games I played were all in Japanese, so hearing them speak English in this game is really awkward to me. There is no problem with the English, its just that I am so used to hearing them in Japanese. Thankfully, the Steam version provides dual audio, meaning you can set your preferred voice language, to which I set mine in Japanese. The console versions of this game, such as the PS4 and Nintendo Switch do not provide dual audio, meaning you are stuck with one language. Like I said, there is nothing wrong with English, I'm just used to Japanese. Seeing that the console versions lack even the most tiniest detail just goes to show that the Steam version is far more superior. With that said, I recommend getting the game on Steam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198272503051', 'num_games_owned': 110, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3808, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1259, 'last_played': 1611295859}
review:
这个移植真的8行，和ns版比手感差距太大，在硬降延迟上提现的特别明显。
硬降延迟，指每一次硬降之后有7帧时间无法进行操作，包括旋转移动hold。
本来是为了避免因为左右按键松开慢了导致的放错，但这个steam版，就形成了比较明显的吃键现象，而ns的就很舒服。直接导致40L成绩ns比steam快5秒以上。
手柄键位配置，就默认的normal，ns可以用r2和l2来hold，你steam版就不让了，是真的8行

对8起，是我之前天梯打的太少，没有意识到这个steam版的天梯体验是多么差，两人准备点了也没有反应，进去之后掉线也频繁，这些如果出现的不多也就算了，但真的非常频繁，搞心态有一手。

author: {'steamid': '76561198148401542', 'num_games_owned': 638, 'num_reviews': 243, 'playtime_forever': 226, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 226, 'last_played': 1555736917}
review: A decent game to play with friends and on your own, the game modes offer a wide selection of things to do and to enjoy.  There is even a story mode to play and it is fun however I should mention that the English voice acting is not bad, some voices are ok, however others are actual pretty good but they don't sound right to me, there is the option to have the Jap voices and such.  The game play is pretty simple it is a little hard to get into but it's easy to pick up but hard to master, I should point out that I did use the the Xbox controller for sometime and it's good however I like using the key bored more as the controls are more simple to use.  There is online however they rank you with people who are pretty good so good luck, also in high level play Tetris has the advantage but if you are not in that skill gap you are in for a hectic game and that's the fun part.  All in all Puyo Puyo Tetris is a fun game to enjoy and I recommend it to any fan of both series.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999125428', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 2770, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1654, 'last_played': 1682865028}
review:
I got this game because I enjoy puyo puyo and tetris. If you just want to play those casually / against AI it works great for it. The multiplayer however is a mess due to a low player count meaning unless you have similar skilled friends it is just a slaughter online if you can manage to find a game.

For puyo puyo or for tetris to just play for fun casually I would 100% recommend this game (and their are some good combination things like switching between or both at once but seems more focused on puyo puyo for that with tetris as a more minor thing.

If a casual sort of game is what you are after this is great. If you can just do endless puyo pyuo or tetris this is great. If you have no problem playing against the AI this is great. If you are looking for a good multiplayer against randoms this game is not it.

There isn't really much to say, it is puyo puyo and it is tetris. If you love them both it is great!

author: {'steamid': '76561198376398796', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 10201, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6415, 'last_played': 1644631782}
review:
Eu sempre gostei de puyo puyo e comecei a me aproximar mais do tetris com este jogo. A jogabilidade junto à trilha sonora, visual e dublagem dos personagens combinam bastante e são bem animados e legais. Para quem gosta de puyo puyo ou Tetris (pode ser apenas um dos dois) eu recomendo fortemente. Para quem não pretende dar muito tempo ao jogo treinando talvez se canse rápido e não compense devido ao preço. Se for comprar para jogar com um amigo recomendo fortemente.

Agora vão alguns pontos negativos do jogo em minha visão:

1) Falta de jogadores 
Este com certeza é um problema grande, pelo menos para mim. No modo online há basicamente 2 principais modos, o Puzzle league e o Free Play. O primeiro o jogo realiza a busca por oponente por você automaticamente e influencia diretamente no seu ranking do jogo. O Free Play por sua vez é onde as pessoas criam as salas e nelas entram os jogadores. No caso do Puzzle league acontece muito de cair com o mesmo oponente e isso as vezes pode ser chato. Em Free Play raramente vejo salas criadas na lista de salas, e quando vejo são em torno de 2 a 3 salas, ou até 1. 

2) Bug do jogo
Não posso deixar de citar isso aqui, o jogo possui um pouco de bug principalmente no modo online. Quando você tenta buscar por oponentes no modo Puzzle league muitas vezes acontece de a tela de espera ficar toda branca, não possibilitando você a encontrar um oponente, e com isso você tem q voltar e puxar a fila novamente. Isso me irrita bastante, vale dizer ;u; . 

Mas em geral o jogo te entretém bastante. Tem o modo offline para você jogar contra bots, se você gosta de jogar offline contra bots ou até mesmo para treinar, é uma boa.

author: {'steamid': '76561198102378295', 'num_games_owned': 80, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 24065, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2246, 'last_played': 1682374890}
review:
(Disclaimer: My thoughts are extremely disorganized and I just wrote things as they came to me, so if it doesn't make sense my apologies)

One day a while ago I played some Tetris and realized I was pretty okay at it, there was just some aspect of it that clicked in my brain. Later, as I was browsing steam for games I ironically would enjoy I found this game and immediately knew I wanted it. Being a bit of a huge weeb I thought it looked amazing. I didn't want to be terrible at the Puyo aspect though so I decided to try playing some Puyo. I was quite garbage at first, but eventually I learned enough to be able to complete Minna De Puyo Puyo. I played other Puyo games to improve my skills (which are still terrible). Eventually I started going back and forth, and for a few weeks I'd play Puyo and the other weeks I'd be playing Tetris (usually marathon or 2P at Tetris Friends). Finally one day I reached a breaking point and decided to shell out the money to buy this game. Best damn investment of my life.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045877467', 'num_games_owned': 750, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 872, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 508, 'last_played': 1613364867}
review:
[b]Biggest pro:[/b] This is probably the most content-rich Tetris game ever created. Between the campaign, the online, and the alternate game modes, you can sink in a lot of hours here without getting bored.

[b]Biggest con:[/b] The matchmaking is absolute dogshit/nonexistent, don't ever expect to play a single evenly matched game in your entire career. I'm pretty sure the ranking system is completely useless and doesn't factor at all into who the game matches you with, you just get put with the first person the game will find. Also sometimes the game just doesn't match you with anyone and you're stuck in an empty lobby, so you have to leave and rejoin.

TL;DR If you can handle getting annihilated over and over again in Tetris endlessly then you will enjoy this game

author: {'steamid': '76561198079048250', 'num_games_owned': 51, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 5010, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3152, 'last_played': 1703337639}
review:
빠요엔이라는 단어가 정착하게 해 준 게임과 오랜시간 사랑 받아온 퍼즐 게임의 콜라보.

하위 랭크는 뿌요가 유리한듯 하지만, 상위 랭크로 올라갈 수록 테트리스가 더 유리합니다. 뿌요랑은 다르게 테트리스는 방해라인으로도 얼마든지 공격이 가능하기 때문이죠. 반대로 하위랭크에선 T스핀과 빌드에 익숙해져 있지 않고 어중간한 공격을 하다간 그 시간에 쌓인 뿌요의 대연쇄에 쳐맞고 꽈당큐 당하기 일쑤입니다.

뿌요 vs 뿌요, 테트 vs 테트의 밸런스는 잘 맞춰져 있는 편입니다. 다만 뿌요vs테트의 경우엔 각각의 특징이 다르다보니, 상대가 어떤걸 고르냐에 따라 다른 전략을 짤 필요가 있습니다.

스위치 판과는 다르게 스팀판은 온라인 대전시 레이트에 맞춰서 잡아주는 편은 아닙니다. 15000레이트가 2000대 레이트가 잡히는 일도 비일비재. 꽤 오랜시간 지적된 문제인데 세가측에서는 고칠 생각이 없어 보입니다. 일해라 세가. 이상한 소닉 게임 만들지 말고. 아니면 제대로 된 소닉게임을 만들던가 ㅠㅠ

review:
I would recommend starting with Tetris Friends if you are planning on getting into Tetris with this game. 3/4 of the people online are absolute gods, and it's extremely hard to win against a majority of them. The story mode also gets very hard very quickly for someone just getting into the game.
As much as I hate Puyo, I really love this game. My preferred way of playing Tetris, even though playing against Puyo at all means I lose automatically.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970538611', 'num_games_owned': 569, 'num_reviews': 241, 'playtime_forever': 473, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 473, 'last_played': 1553224342}
review:
The "adventure mode" is tedious and off-putting. The last thing Tetris needs is a story, especially some lame Pokemon weeaboo crap. I only bought it for that game mode since quality Tetris games are so hard to find these days. 

The last good Tetris game was Acid Tetris, which I'm sure you can still find floating around some abandonware sites somewhere (it's free), but good luck getting it running. I give this game 10 neckbeards / 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061798998', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 4234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4010, 'last_played': 1562918412}
review:
This game is fine on a switch but laggy as f*** on a PC. I'm running i7-8750H, 16GB ram and GTX1060, not the best PC but certainly f***ing enough to run a tetris game. Still there's lag spikes, especially when puyo/tetris combos are made by the opponent. Addition to that, keystrokes are just eaten randomly. This means that pressing key does not register as pressed, how the fuck am I supposed play quickly? 

Let's not mention the amount of bugs in this game. Online mode often will just give a blank screen, one must quit the mode to fix it. If an opponent closes the game, your game is left frozen for a long time. If you close it, you lose fucking points. Then there's people who join games without starting, taking up a spot. 

This PC remake is s***, but what else would you expect from a s*** company called SEGA? If it wasn't for all the *people* in the Sonic fandom, this company would have been as dead as the ideology of communism. 

Tetris Online Japan is better than this pile of trash.

review:
아니 고인물이 있고 이런것도 다 좋은데 티스핀 없는 모드도 쫌 만들어라 아니 무슨 티스핀 때문에 고작 2칸 없애는건데 나한테 돌아

오는게 이렇게 크면 애초에 테트리스가 아니고 티스핀으로 바꾸던지 ;;;; 

티스핀 없는 모드도 만들어라!!@!~!@~!@~!~!@~!@~!~!@!~! 내 랭크가  어느정도는 되는구나 를 알수가 없잖아 .... 

둘중에 정해주세요 이름을 T-Spin 이라고 짓던지 t-spin 없는 모드도 만들어 주던지

연습을 하면 티스핀을 할 수 있겠지만 테트리스는 그재미 보단 쌓아서 한방에 없애는 그런 재미에 하는건데 

애초에 티스핀 때문에 빌드가 정해져있고 개 노잼이니까 빨리 만드러주세요!!!!!~@~!@~!@~!@!~@!~@~!

review:
Amazingly fun game, a shame they didn´t think about the battle royale option for competitive gameplay... all said, they could probably add it and the game should work... even if its only against 10 people at a time or something.

The mixture with puyo puyo makes this game chaotic for western players that didn´t know about that franchise, but still, quite fan to play and more fan with the different hybrid gamemodes.

review:
제가 정말 이걸사고 거의 폐인마냥 하는 사람인데 말이죠 캐릭터들(특히 크루크 아 사랑해 진짜)에서 한번 치이고,레이팅에서 고인물말고 뉴비만나면 어찌나 반갑던지 보는게 귀엽습지다(희귀종같은 뉴비지만 보면 흐뭇-)

그리고 바이브레이션 효과로 캐릭터 목소리가 울리는것 까지 정말 좋습니다.다만 앞글자만 울리게 하는방법을 몰라서 말이죠 아시는분 있으면 알려주시면 좋겠고,여러분 즐거운 뿌테라이프- 크루크 죽어도 사랑해~~/♡\

author: {'steamid': '76561198273493882', 'num_games_owned': 183, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 5888, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4598, 'last_played': 1704853608}
review:
Puyo Puyo Tetris es el último juego de la saga Puyo en ser lanzado en occidente, siendo también el primero en ocupar por primera vez su nombre original desde el primer juego. En este juego encontrarás personajes entrañables, una historia que te sacará carcajadas a montón y dos juegos completamente diferentes compitiendo codo a codo, además de numerosos modos que cambian la fórmula de cada uno. Muy divertido de jugar por cuenta propia y aún más con amigos, muy recomendado!
El único punto bajo que le encuentro son los servers, son lo único que mejoraría de este juego.

author: {'steamid': '76561198130409641', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 3219, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3195, 'last_played': 1591191931}
review:
自分はほぼテトリス専なのでテトリス側からレビュー。
このゲームはぷよぷよとの速度差を埋めるためか、ミノを接着させてから次のミノが出現するまで6フレーム程度の硬直時間が存在します。
これにより回転やHOLD等の操作が抜けることがあり非常に積みにくいです。
TGMシリーズのように硬直時間中にボタンを先行入力することもできないので、この時間は完全に無駄です。

対戦についてですが、ぷよぷよはツモの同一性が保証されているのにテトリスではされていません。個人的にこの仕様は平等性に欠けると思います。
ネット対戦はレート差が15,000あったりしてもマッチングしたりしますが、これは過疎なので仕方ないことでしょう…。
ラグプレイヤーも多く、1手ごとに数秒待たされることも多々あります。

正直定価の\3,490の価値は全くありません。[strike]PCでテトリスを遊ぶ分ならフリーのTetris Friendsの方がオススメです。[/strike]最悪自分で作ったほうがマシです。
キャラゲーと割り切ってストーリーを楽しむ分には良いと思います。



[strike]現在のテトリスのガイドラインではT-Spin NEOという非常に特殊な地形でT-Spinを決めるとMini T-Spin Doubleとなりますが、このゲームでは未定義なためかエラー落ちします。
The Tetris Company様およびBlue Planet Software様の素晴らしい審査体制に圧倒的感謝[/strike]
2019/03/06 追記 : この不具合は日本語化パッチ導入下限定で発生します。
2019/08/02 追記 : Tetris Friendsは5月31日をもってサービス終了しました。現在、PC環境でネット対戦可能な「Tetris®」は私の知る限りではありません。
[spoiler]Tetris®でなければありますが、非公式のクローンゲームであるため詳細はご自分で調べてください。[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198011053164', 'num_games_owned': 346, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 2199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 956, 'last_played': 1630185238}
review:
This game is a mix between two different games. Namely, Tetris and Puyo puyo. The colors, the cringy dialogue and the cute characters really made me curious. They scream and say weird lines when attacking each other! 

I think in around the past 8 years I never played tetris for some reason. Seeing that a tetris pvp game isn't something new. It was still enough reason for me to try it since it has been so long.

I haven't played many puzzle games and never even heard of Puyo Puyo before this game. Looking it up it seemed very confusing and how people played it made no sense. Thankfully, the game has some short tutorials. It would have been better with more tutorials and a bigger explanation in my opinion. I still had to look up strategies or guides from good Puyo Puyo/Tetris players. Which is fine but I wish the game could explain things too.

There are many modes. The online mode with ranked and free play (unranked basically). local-online mode (splitscreen), Story mode (single player) and challenge mode (single player). When playing the online modes it is the same gameplay as playing the single player modes. There is two different games that can play at the same time which is written in the title. A nice thing is that you can play a lot of extra modes. They are not complicated and just trying them out will give a good understanding. Check the store page if you want to read a short description on the extra modes.

The online mode is kind of dead. Where most if not always you will face against experienced players and matchmaking favors finding an opponent instead of finding someone at your skill level. For a beginner (me), you will lose and lose and lose. It is a very sad beginner experience. You can play with friends instead but I guess this is a symptom of only hardcore players available. 

Something cool would have been crossplay where you can play against any person with this game. PC crowd is not that big and I know many don't enjoy losing every game against online opponents. Sure, you don't need to win all the time to enjoy this game. I had 0 wins and I still had fun (although, less fun). I can see people not wanting to play a game where the difficulty is too big.

The game has a story mode. Shortly described: cute and silly. Most of characters love teasing another character. One big thing I learned is that this game has a lot of history (earlier Puyo Puyo games etc). It is noticeable in the story in how the Puyo characters talk to each other. A lot of new characters will make an appearance. I would call them the tetris characters. I enjoy most of the characters, it is cartoony or childish but it works with the colors and overall look of the game. If you are looking for a deep story or something dark, this is not it! 

If you don't care that much about the characters and just want to fight the ai, I would just skip the story mode dialogue or the whole story. If you beat the story, you get unlockable characters, voice lines, themes and background music. Which can be cool to get. . . . Also it is much harder playing online than against the ai.

The game has good music and nice voice acting, there is japanese audio (Puyo Puyo shoubu) or english audio (Puyo Puyo battle) and you can change in the options. If you think the voices are too loud or annoying, you can lower them or even turn it off in the options menu. In a 4 player match for example, you will hear a lot of "attack" voices and it really turns into a voice spam. 

Summary: Fun game with colorful characters and personalities. It is a puzzle game where you can battle each other! Local/online multiplayer or against the ai solo.  You can have fun with online matchmaking but expect unfair games if you are a beginner (or not if you are pro). Apparently Puyo Puyo has an e-sports scene in japan. Cool!

review:
A love letter to puzzle game fans. Puyo Puyo and Tetris at it's all time high. 
Full of modes, a good tutorial, and great competitive multiplayer fun.
This game screams character and is full of charm. I absolutely love this game.
An absolute must play for puzzle game fans.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083832501', 'num_games_owned': 289, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 4279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3465, 'last_played': 1616882986}
review: Después de horas de juego, creo que puedo dar un veredicto acerca de este juego. El juego esta muy bien, tiene algunas cosas molestas como el menú que se encuentra un poco desorganizado. Pero después el juego es muy divertido, puedes jugar de 4 con amigos en local, que se agrede. Lo más importante, no siento que haya desbalanceo entre puyo y tetris, cada uno tiene una forma distinta de juego y se complementan realmente muy bien. La campaña funciona realmente bien como tutorial para los nuevos en las sagas (Recomiendo hacerlo para desbloquear los personajes faltantes)

author: {'steamid': '76561198370114284', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 10059, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4772, 'last_played': 1709730672}
review:
이 게임을 스위치로 처음 접해서 그런지 PC로 처음 접할때는 어려웠고 이 게임에 크게 관심도 없었다. 그러나 이 게임의 캐릭터와 다른 시리즈에 관심이 생기고 난 후, 이 게임을 많이 안 하던 내가 이 게임을 70시간 이상을 플레이했고 나중에 100시간까지 갈 수 있을 정도로 지금은 이 게임에 대한 애증이 크다. (+그리고 결국 100시간까지 가버렸다.....)

일단 게임 자체는 나쁘지 않고 재미있다. 나홀로 플레이 프리대전에 AI도 각 캐릭터마다 실력이 달라서 플레이 하는 재미도 있고 캐릭터들 때문에 하는 맛도 있다. 

하지만 멀티는 아수라장인데 방 잡히는 속도가 느리지 않아서 좋은데 그 대신 상대가 엄청난 고인물이든 아니든 아무나 매칭 시켜주고 게임할때 프레임이 불안정하고 서버도 이상해서 친구랑 여러판하면서 많이 튕겼었다. 

그래도 그나마 들 튕기는 법이 있는데 게임화면을 창모드로 하면 멀티를 어느정도 정상적으로 플레이는 가능하다. 그러나 최근에는 이 방법으로 해도 한판도 끝내기 전에 튕긴다. (일해라 세가!!!) <- 그러나 최근에 멀티를 해보니깐, 예상외로 잘 된다. (오오 세가가 일한다.)

결론: 게임은 재밌고 충분히 만족스럽다. 그러나 멀티는 아쉬운 부분이 많다.
이 게임은 이때까지 33% 세일만 해서 나중에 크게 세일하면 손해보는거라고 생각할수도 있지만 33% 세일에 사도 딱히 후회는 없다. (당신이 뿌요뿌요나 테트리스를 좋아한다면....)

author: {'steamid': '76561198040578523', 'num_games_owned': 292, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 4072, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4072, 'last_played': 1542856266}
review:
Puyo Puyo Tetris is a reasonably fun time if you have a passing familiarity with either Puyo or Tetris. And since basically everyone has heard of Tetris, it's a fantastic introduction to the world of Puyo.

The single player modes range from an absolutely hilarious story that gets players up to speed on both games with a solid difficulty curve, to a variety of what amount to practice modes or matches against the AI. Going for 3 stars on each story mission turns out to require a decent amount of finesse in both games, though I think just about anyone can manage it.

The multiplayer is a bit of a mixed bag. The standard "Versus" mode pits two players who can be playing either Puyo or Tetris against each other. Mirror matches are the best experience here when the players are of similar skill levels, but unfortunately the matchmaking just doesn't allow for that very often. A total newcomer can be matched with some of the top players, and that can be somewhat demoralizing. It doesn't help that all modes are ranked together into one rating, and some are far easier to play than others.

Anyway, a Puyo vs. Tetris matchup isn't much fun for either side as the altered damage mechanics turn it into a bit of a grind, unless the Puyo player is significantly better (drop a 7+ chain on the Tetris and win) or the Tetris player is significantly faster (you can actually stunlock with sufficient speed, and even at slower speeds you can bury the chain). It's still fun with friends for the novelty of it, but I mostly stayed out of ranked Versus.

Swap is probably the most fun mode as it forces mirror matches, and also swaps between Puyo and Tetris. I'm a pretty well rounded player (better at Tetris, admittedly) and building a combo and a chain at the same time was always a fun time. Unfortunately, most people just play Versus. Fusion I also liked quite a lot, which is basically Puyo if Puyo was based around fast play instead of building a big chain, while also playing Tetris in the same board. It's a little weird to wrap your head around but I love it.

Big Bang is Fever or "know your SRS" simulator. Nothing too great. Party is a score attack Versus which is... maybe better? Tetris has an advantage at both low and high levels but Puyo is way stronger at mid-level play. It's weird.

Of course, none of the matchmaking issues matter if you play with friends, and none of the balance issues matter when there aren't points on the line or... it's just fun among friends. So I highly recommend this game as a sort of party game among friends. You can play with up to 4 people at a time and I picked up the game just to play with a couple friends, and I had a blast. The price of admission can seem a little steep, but if you like either game then there's actually enough here to justify it on its own, without even trying the other game.

Puyo Puyo Tetris is best experienced as a mashup of both games, though, so give it a shot!

author: {'steamid': '76561198398653251', 'num_games_owned': 95, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 10836, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2983, 'last_played': 1604932233}
review:
こういういろんなハードや媒体で出してくれる会社素晴らしいですね。

買う人の大半は元々ぷよかテトかが好きで買うと思うので、新規の方向けのレビューをしたいと思います。

まず、ぷよぷよもテトリスも根強いファンが多いのでネット対戦はほぼ廃れることは無く、何年も末永く遊べるゲームです。
steamなら新しいハードが出てネットサービスが終了するとか、人が流れるとか、そういうこともほぼないと思います。
やりきりゲーや、流行ゲーではないことは確か。

で、キャラクターにひかれて買おうかな、と思ってる人は気を付けてください、キャラクター一切関係ないですこのゲーム。
ストーリーも無いようなものですし、性能にも差はありません、本当に飾りです。

落ちゲーやパズルゲーが好きだけど、ぷよもテトもやったことない、というのであればぜひ購入をオススメします。


ただ私はパネポンやドクマリのほうが好きだけどな…。

author: {'steamid': '76561198032575440', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 2465, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2465, 'last_played': 1550189898}
review:
I like [i]Tetris[/i] and I bought this on sale because it has [i]Tetris.[/i]  If you're buying it for [i]Tetris[/i] only: decent game, although maybe not at full price.

I didn't know anything about [i]Puyo Puyo[/i] going in but wow, who would have thought the lore behind a color-matching puzzle game would be so deep?  Story mode has a lot of "hello my name is <character> and it's time to battle; OK goodbye forever."  It turns out there have been a [i]lot[/i] of [i]Puyo Puyo[/i] titles over the years and the designers here did their best to cram every fan favorite character in.

It also turns out I dislike the gameplay of [i]Puyo Puyo,[/i] because you're rewarded not for efficiency of matching and keeping a clear playing field, but for lining up chain reactions, which is basically the opposite of the [i]Tetris[/i] gameplay.  I think I have an unconscious revulsion to this enforced strategy, which is interesting on a personal psychological note but obviously not universal.  Still, if you're a [i]Tetris[/i] person, consider the other half of the game.  Or if you're a [i]Puyo Puyo[/i] person who doesn't usually play [i]Tetris,[/i] consider that too.  

Story mode is still possible if you are terrible at one or the other game, but you have to fail a level three times to get a gentleman's pass.  Single-player/arcade mode with just [i]Tetris[/i] or just [i]Puyo Puyo[/i] are available.  Can't comment on local multiplayer nor online as I am a hermit.

review: I don't like Tetris, but Puyo Puyo is a classic. This game scratched an itch for me and did a nice and polished job of it at that. I don't expect to play this a ton, but it is nice to know that I can relax with a sort of puzzler that nicely adapts to however intense I am feeling; puyo puyo can stretch to encompass a ton of different skill and energy levels. There is not much to expect out of this game, but it is likely the best execution possible of a relatively simple concept.

review:
솔직한 후기 입니다.

전 테트리스는 전혀 못해서 뿌요만 하는데

고인물은 1:1 전에서 5번? 중에 1번 꼴로 만납니다.

* 단점은 4명이서 하고싶은데 아는 지인들이나 친구들 아님 같이 하기 어려워요
그만큼 매칭이 없습니다.
사람이 파논 방 들어가려해도 보이는 방갯수 1~2개 없으면 0개

1:1 전은 매칭 잘 되요
// 단점은 고인물이 간혹 튀어나온다는것이죠ㅋ

-> 한글패치 하니 좋네요
에잇~빵야(10년동안 빵야로 들었는데 빠이야 였다니..)
아이스톰~
달걀큐~(뿌요뿌요2시절) 지금은 4연쇄하니 이상한 음성을 지르네요

여튼 게임은 재밌습니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028322145', 'num_games_owned': 473, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1700527897}
review:
Duas das mais fortes franquias de puzzle unidas. E acredite, este jogo é bom.

Multiplayer local ótimo, e mesmo com pessoas jogando tetris e outras escolhendo puyo puyo, há um equilíbrio. (Embora eu prefira que todos joguem nas mesmas condições, exceto no modo swap).

A história é dispensável, os personagens são fracos, as vozes são irritantes. Mas em compensação existem bons tutoriais para te ensinar a jogar tetris e também puyo puyo. Dominar os movimentos especiais é essencial para fazer combos fortes nesse jogo.

Não sei como é o online dele, pois jogo sempre no multi local em casa. O single player e modo história é divertido, aprendi a jogar um pouco de puyo puyo com ele.

Este até o momento é o melhor tetris que joguei, consegue ser melhor que o tetris DS. Não deixe as cores gritantes e os personagens infantis te causem má impressão. É um ótimo jogo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198397366499', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 6699, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5970, 'last_played': 1683043699}
review:
현재 뿌테 100시간 넘게 한 유저입니다. (19/02/10)

테트리스 같은 아케이드 게임을 좋아해서 구매하였습니다.
가격은 솔직히 세일할 때 구매해도 아쉬운 감이 큽니다. 
서버, 진입장벽(특히 매칭이 말도 안됨) 이 큰 단점인 거 같습니다.
 
뉴비에요? 유튜브 보다가 재밌어서 혹하는 맘에 유입되셨다구요?
이제 막 열심히 쌓는데 콤보가 오지게 날라올 겁니다.
다소 유치할수 있고 네다ㅆ 스러워 보일수 있는 인터페이스지만
어찌보면 캐릭터의 보이스를 듣는 맛도 꽤나 있습니다,
(ex.  빠요엔 )

유입이 적은 편이고 계속 고인물들이 썩어가는 게임인데,
친구랑 다같이 할거면 생각보다 재밌습니다만, 
실력 차이가 클 시 솔직히 노잼입니다. 
(전 이렇게 뿌테가 분노조장게임 인줄 몰랐습니다.)

근성으로 레이팅을 높여보세요. 꽤나 쏠쏠합니다.

그런의미로 더러운 뿌가놈들 ㅠ

author: {'steamid': '76561198330735984', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 759, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 759, 'last_played': 1549572452}
review:
Das beste Tetris zur Zeit bei Steam. Sehr viele Spielmodi. 
Die Steine lassen sich bis zum Schluß ganz weit oben noch gut drehen und positionieren, sodaß eine Rettung ab und an dann doch noch möglich ist.
Beim Multiplayer können alle Spieler frei wählen zwischen Puyo Puyo oder Tetris.
Macht Spaß.

author: {'steamid': '76561198185668014', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 2895, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1490, 'last_played': 1617624727}
review:
대중적인 인-싸 게임
장점
1.뿌요뿌요와 테트리스를 같이 즐길 수 있다.
2.이미 화석 연료가 되어버린 자신을 보고 뿌듯해질 수 있다.
3.리그 레이팅을 보고 자신이 얼마나 사람이 아닌지를 느낄 수 있다.
4.ㅅㅈㅎㅈ

단점
1.초보에게는 봇새끼가 등짝 스매싱 존-나 찰지게 쳐놓는다.
2.아싸라면 이걸 사고나서 존-나 처량해진 자신을 볼 수 있다.
3.전 세계 서버를 하나로 통합하여 이세계 서버가 아닐만큼 잘 팅긴다. (특히 서양)
4.빠요엔은 개뿔 눈 깜빡하면 이미 15스택이 자신에게 떨어지는 황홀함을 볼 수 있다.
5.초보는 테트리스로 뿌요뿌요를 이긴다는 생각을 하면 안되는 게임이다.
6.추천하지마라 주변사람들 다 환불한다.
7.온라인 랜덤매칭은 친목 존나심해서 리그만 돌아야한다.
8.리그나마도 클린하지않은 고인물이 넘쳐나는 소굴이다.
9.더이상 테트리스에 손을 댈 수 없게 되버린다.
10.싱글 플레이만 존나 돌고있는 자신을 볼 수 있다.

review: 제가 처음으로 테트리스라는 게임을 접해본지 어언3년 동안 테트리스 라는게임을 잊은 채살고있었지만 어떤 방송으로 인하여 다시 테트리스라는 게임에 호기심을 갖게되고 이게임에 대해 알게되었으며 뿌요라는 개ㅅ... 새로운 게임을 알게되었고 테트리스로 경쟁하며 플레이할수있다는것이 흥미로웠습니다 각각의 캐릭터들마다 컨셉이 다 달라 같은게임이라도 지루하지 않게 플레이할수있고 여러명이 동시에 같은 게임을 할수있다는것이 이게임에 장점인것 같습니다 만약 이게임을 사신다면 주저하지 말고 사보십시오 극상의 즐거움을 얻으실수있을겁니다

author: {'steamid': '76561198822356822', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 59272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33692, 'last_played': 1683707317}
review:
나름 장단점을 평가할만큼은 했다고 생각합니다. 뉴비분들은 사시기 전 한번만 읽어주셨으면 좋겠습니다.
장점
1. 큐돌릴때 정말 빨리 잡힙니다. 이미 테트리스나 뿌요뿌요를 다른 게임을 통해 접해본 상태라서 고인물과의 대전이 두렵지 않은 상태라면 정말 편하고 빠르게 매칭을 잡을 수 있습니다.

2. ARR(방향키를 꾹 누르고 있을때의 미노 이동속도)의 상한이 꽤 낮은편이며 라인클리어시에 딜레이가 깁니다. 처음에는 다소 불편하게 느낄 수 있지만 어느정도 익숙해지고 나서는 기본적으로 속도와 생존을 위한 콤보에 치중한 테트리스가 아닌 기술적인 측면이 더 강하게 부각되는 테트리스를 즐길 수 있습니다.

3. 제가 이 게임을 산 이유입니다. 개인적인 취향이지만 라인클리어와 블럭을 쌓을 때의 타격감이 다른 테트리스에 비해 묵직하고 좋습니다. 취향을 탈 수 있지만 저는 이 게임 특유의 묵직한 타격감이 게임을 좀 더 긴장감 넘치게 즐길 수 있게 해 주어서 마음에 들었습니다.

단점.
1. 네트워크. 상대가 핑렉이 걸리거나 랜뽑을 할 경우엔 답이 없습니다. 게임 자체로도 가끔 튕기는 경우가 있습니다만 상대가 네트워크를 끊어서 매치가 멈췄을 경우 게임을 껐다 키면 자신의 레이팅이 쭉 내려가 있는 것을 볼 수 있습니다. 또한 상대가 핑렉이 걸리는 상대일 경우엔 2초에 미노가 하나씩 나오는 기적적인 일을 목도하고 환불신청에 손가락이 갈 수 있습니다.

2. 매칭속도는 정말 빠르지만 문제는 레이팅 상관없이 아무거나 잡아주는지라 뉴비와 고인물이 만나 뉴비가 살살 녹는 경우를 자주 볼 수 있습니다. 빤쓰런 기능이 있기에 자신의 실력에 너무 맞지 않는 상대라고 판단되면 빤쓰런을 하는 것이 옳습니다.

3. 가장 큰 단점입니다. 네트워크에 제한 걸어 좋은 네트워크인 상대를 만나도 어느정도 핑렉이 존재합니다. 이 게임은 상대의 블럭 하나하나의 회전 등의 움직임이 보일 만큼 동기화를 많이  하는 게임입니다. 그 동기화타임때문인지 중간에 핑렉이 한두번 걸리면 하드드랍이나 회전키가 씹히는 경우가 많습니다. 

사실 테트리스만 하신다면 핑렉과 랜뽑이 난무하는 이 똥겜을 사지 않는 것이 좋다고 생각합니다만, 뿌요뿌요라는 다른 게임과 함께 가능하다는 점, 기술적인 측면이 강조되다는 점 등은 높이 평가할만 하기에 추천드립니다.
